HEADLINE: Tom Lee, who predicted the previous bull market, announced his new predictions for Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH)! He gave the date!
SUMMARY: Fundstrat co-founder and Bitmine Technologies CEO Tom Lee, who has made a name for himself with his bold predictions about Bitcoin and the market, announced his new predictions. Speaking to CNBC, Tom Lee shared his price expectations, stating that the rise in Bitcoin and Ethereum is not over yet. Lee noted that Bitcoin is increasingly viewed as a macro asset like gold, and this shift in perception is driving more capital into the market. At this point, Lee argued that Bitcoin would reach $250,000 by the end of this year. Lee stated that even at $250,000, BTC would only be worth 25% of the gold market, highlighting how much potential Bitcoin still has. Ethereum on the Rise! Lee, who also announced his price prediction for Ethereum in addition to Bitcoin, predicted that Ethereum would rise to $4,000 in the short term by the end of July and to $15,000 in the medium term by the end of the year. Lee stated that he is confident in his prediction and said that Ethereum''s recent performance and strong fundamentals will support this rise. The expert noted that he sees the $5,000 level as a technical turning point as Ethereum surpasses its previous record high. Lee, who attributed Ethereum''s upward trend to its compliance with US regulations and its growing utility in the global financial sphere, said that renewed interest from institutional investors will accelerate Ethereum''s growth and rise. At this point, Lee claimed that the institutional narrative of Bitcoin as digital gold is still intact, but ETH could offer more upside potential in the next few years due to it being the network through which institutions tokenize financial assets. ‚ÄúWall Street wants to find a large chain that operates compliantly in the U.S. and already has a lot of real-world assets. This is why Ethereum has become so important.‚Äù *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Tom Lee, who predicted the previous bull market, announced his new predictions for Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum (ETH)! He gave the date!

HEADLINE: Binance BTC Transfer: Unveiling a Strategic $77.4M Move to Ceffu
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Binance BTC Transfer: Unveiling a Strategic $77.4M Move to Ceffu In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, significant asset movements often capture the attention of investors and analysts. Recently, a notable Binance BTC transfer occurred, signaling a strategic operational move by one of the globe‚Äôs leading crypto exchanges. Blockchain tracking service Whale Alert reported a substantial transfer of 656 Bitcoin (BTC), valued at approximately $77.4 million, from Binance Exchange to Ceffu, Binance‚Äôs dedicated institutional custody platform. This isn‚Äôt just a routine transaction; it offers a compelling insight into the advanced security measures and operational strategies employed by major players in the crypto space. What does this massive Binance BTC transfer signify for the broader crypto ecosystem and the security of institutional funds? Understanding the Strategic Binance BTC Transfer The recent Binance BTC transfer , as reported by Whale Alert, involved a significant amount of Bitcoin moving between entities closely associated with Binance. This was an internal relocation of assets to a highly specialized custody solution, not a transfer to an external wallet or exchange. Such large-scale movements are meticulously tracked by blockchain analytics firms for insights into market dynamics or shifts in institutional strategies. Here‚Äôs a snapshot of this particular Binance BTC transfer : Detail Description Amount Transferred 656 BTC Approximate Value $77.4 million Source Binance Exchange Destination Ceffu (Binance‚Äôs institutional custody platform) This type of substantial Binance BTC transfer is a crucial aspect of managing vast digital asset reserves. It highlights the evolving infrastructure of crypto, particularly how exchanges secure client funds, especially for high-net-worth and institutional clients. Why is a Binance BTC Transfer to Ceffu Crucial? A Binance BTC transfer to an institutional custody platform like Ceffu carries significant implications beyond a simple transaction. It‚Äôs a strategic decision focused on security, regulatory adherence, and building client trust. Institutional custody solutions offer enhanced security measures far exceeding standard exchange hot or cold wallets, often incorporating multi-signature schemes, hardware security modules (HSMs), and stringent operational procedures to mitigate risks like hacking or fraud. The crucial aspects include: Unmatched Security: Ceffu specializes in secure asset management for institutions. Moving a large sum via this Binance BTC transfer indicates a commitment to the highest security protocols for these specific funds, likely managed for institutional clients. Regulatory Alignment: Institutional custody providers typically adhere to strict regulatory frameworks, including regular audits and robust AML/KYC. This move aligns with Binance‚Äôs efforts to meet global regulatory standards for institutional offerings. Enhanced Client Confidence: For institutional clients, knowing their assets are held by a dedicated, secure custody provider like Ceffu, separate from the exchange‚Äôs operational wallets, significantly boosts trust in Binance‚Äôs services. Operational Segregation: Separating institutional assets into a dedicated custody solution improves operational efficiency and risk management, ensuring client funds are distinct from the exchange‚Äôs proprietary assets. Ultimately, this Binance BTC transfer underscores a commitment to providing enterprise-grade security and services for significant asset holders within the Binance ecosystem. Ceffu: Securing Your Binance BTC Transfer and More Ceffu, formerly Binance Custody, is Binance‚Äôs independent, institutional-grade custody solution. It was created to meet the rigorous demands of institutional investors‚Äîsuch as hedge funds, asset managers, and corporations‚Äîwho require specialized security for their substantial digital asset holdings. Ceffu operates as a standalone entity, though closely affiliated with Binance, ensuring clear operational separation and enhanced governance. Ceffu‚Äôs robust approach to securing assets, including those involved in a Binance BTC transfer , typically encompasses: Dominant Cold Storage: The vast majority of assets are kept offline, significantly reducing online hack risks. Multi-Party Computation (MPC) Technology: This advanced cryptographic technique allows multiple parties to jointly compute a function while keeping their inputs private, eliminating single points of failure for private keys. Air-Gapped Systems: Transaction signing systems are often physically isolated from unsecured networks. Regular Audits & Insurance: Reputable custodians like Ceffu undergo independent security audits and may offer insurance against certain losses, further enhancing confidence. The utilization of Ceffu for this significant Binance BTC transfer exemplifies Binance‚Äôs multi-layered security architecture, designed to protect assets across various risk exposures. Does a Binance BTC

HEADLINE: Ether Prints ''Doji'' as XRP Teases Double Top at $3.65
SUMMARY: This is a daily analysis of top tokens with CME futures by CoinDesk analyst and Chartered Market Technician Omkar Godbole. Ether: Signs of Indecision ETH''s Doji candle on Monday signals indecision in the market following a near 90-degree rise from $2,100 to $3,800 in less than four weeks. The pattern has neutralized the immediate bullish outlook, establishing Monday''s high of $3,859 as the level to beat for the bulls. Note that the $3,800-$4,100 range is where ether topped out in March 2024, May 2024 and December 2024. While prices remain below Monday''s high, the focus will be on the bearish shift in intraday indicators and the possibility of a notable price pullback. Price action on the 15-minute candlestick chart indicates a breakdown of the head-and-shoulders (H&S) pattern. The bearish pattern suggests a potential price drop to $3,550. Supporting the interim bear case is the hourly chart, where prices have crossed below the Ichimoku cloud, signaling a bearish shift in momentum. AI''s take: Traders should be cautious, watching if ETH can definitively break and hold above this multi-month ceiling ($3,800-$4,100) or if a pullback is imminent from this historically topped-out zone. Resistance: $4,000, $4,109 , $4,382. Support: $3,480, $3,081, $2,879. XRP: Double top Since Friday, XRP has largely traded within a range, with upside capped above $3.60 and support at around $3.35. The sideways churn resembles a typical temporary bull breather observed after strong rallies. That said, on the hourly chart, it has taken the shape of a double top, a bearish reversal pattern identified by twin peaks separated by a valley (price drop). A move below $3.35 would trigger the double top breakdown, potentially opening the door for an extended pullback to $3.00. The Guppy multiple moving average (GMMA) indicator has already flipped bearish on the hourly chart, suggesting greater odds of a double top breakdown. On the higher side, a convincing move above $3.65 would signal the continuation of the bull run that has seen prices surge 54% to record highs this month. AI''s take: While XRP''s broader outlook remains constructive, the current double top and bearish hourly GMMA warrant caution. Resistance: $3.65, $4.00 Support: $3.35, $3.00, $2.65. Bitcoin: Triangular consolidation BTC continues to consolidate in a descending triangle, identified by a downward-sloping trendline connecting lower highs since July 14, and another trendline connecting the horizontal support at around $116,000. A move past the upper trendline would signal the end of the bull breather, potentially yielding a rally to record highs above $123,000. Conversely, a downside break would raise the risk of a deeper pullback, with major support seen directly at $111,965, the former record high from May. AI''s take: BTC is currently at a high-stakes inflection point, consolidating within a bearish descending triangle, making its immediate future direction highly contingent on a decisive break of key price levels. Resistance: $120,000, $123,181. Support: $116,000, $115,739, $111,965. Solana: Fades spike above $200 SOL has pulled back to $194 from the five-month high of $204 early today, printing a daily candle with a long upper wick, a sign of sellers looking to reassert themselves. Key momentum indicators, such as the hourly chart MACD, have flipped decisively bearish, suggesting scope for an extended decline toward the former resistance-turned-support level at $185. The broader outlook remains constructive, as prices remain above the Ichimoku cloud on the daily chart and are locked in an ascending channel. AI''s take: The pullback from $204 with a long upper wick and bearish hourly MACD signals immediate selling pressure and the potential for a deeper short-term correction towards $185. Resistance: $204, $218, $252-$264.

HEADLINE: Ethereum Rally Makes Eric Trump Look Like a Genius
SUMMARY: Trump specifically pointed out a 35% gain since his post and told followers to ‚Äúembrace volatility.‚Äù Despite a steep drop after his endorsement, ETH has recovered and is now up around 12% year-to-date.Overall, Trump family crypto ventures‚Äîincluding $2 billion in BTC holdings by Trump Media and a $220M Bitcoin fund by Eric and Donald Jr.‚Äîhave reportedly boosted Donald Trump‚Äôs fortune by over $620M. Ethereum also drew attention from Andrew Keys of The Ether Machine, who claimed ETH massively outperformed Bitcoin long-term. He also predicted a possible rise to $8,000 by 2026. Eric Trump Claps Back Eric Trump took to social media on Monday to celebrate Ethereum‚Äôs strong resurgence above the $3,800 mark. He also responded to critics who mocked his earlier support for the cryptocurrency. His comments were mainly directed at Ted Pillows, a partner at crypto exchange OKX, who ridiculed Trump in April after Ethereum experienced a steep drop in February and March. Quoting Pillows'' old post, Eric wrote, ‚ÄúHow am I doing now @TedPillows?‚Äù and followed up with a confident message to another user , boasting a 35% gain in five months and encouraging them to ‚Äúembrace volatility.‚Äù He also reiterated that smart investors would have bought the dips, just as he advised people to do at the time. Eric Trump‚Äôs claim isn‚Äôt without merit. ETH was trading around $2,877 on Feb. 4 when Trump publicly backed the asset. On Monday, however, ETH was sitting at $3,732, which is an unrealized gain of approximately 30% for those who followed his lead. On the other hand, it wasn‚Äôt a smooth ride. Ethereum plunged by almost 49% in the weeks after his post before recovering. Despite the ups and downs, Ethereum is now up roughly 12% year-to-date. Looking ahead, analyst Gert van Lagen sees more potential for Ethereum. He recently mentioned that ETH‚Äôs current market structure closely mirrors that of the Dow Jones Industrial Average in 1980. Based on this comparison, he forecasted a possible climb to $8,000 by early 2026. This could mean that the cryptocurrency may still be in the midst of a long-term bullish trend. The Trump family‚Äôs involvement in crypto goes far beyond tweets. Trump Media and Technology Group, which operates the Truth Social platform, recently revealed it holds $2 billion in Bitcoin and Bitcoin-related securities. Meanwhile, Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr. are listed as founders of American Bitcoin, a company that raised $220 million from institutional investors to buy Bitcoin and mining equipment. TMTG press release All three Trump sons are also co-founders of World Liberty Financial, with President Donald Trump himself serving as co-founder emeritus. Altogether, these crypto-related ventures reportedly boosted Trump‚Äôs personal fortune by at least $620 million in just a few months. Ethereum Outshines Bitcoin? Andrew Keys , co-founder and chairman of Ethereum-focused investment firm The Ether Machine, also believes investors would have greatly outperformed Bitcoin holders if they invested in ETH over the past decade. On CNBC‚Äôs Squawk Box on Monday, Keys initially claimed Ethereum would have made investors 50 times wealthier than Bitcoin but later corrected the figure to 30 times in a follow-up post on X. His firm, The Ether Machine, plans to go public and is set to become the largest institutional Ethereum investment vehicle, launching with more than 400,000 ETH‚Äîcurrently valued at about $1.5 billion. This would surpass the ETH holdings of existing firms like Bitmine and SharpLink. Keys described himself as an ‚ÄúEthereum guy‚Äù and admitted to not owning any Bitcoin. He even compared Bitcoin to a landline and Ethereum to an iPhone, due to his belief in Ethereum''s broader utility and innovation. He also argued that Ethereum is the primary beneficiary of the recently passed GENIUS Act, as the majority of stablecoins are deployed on the Ethereum network. He compared Ethereum‚Äôs dominance in tokenization to Google‚Äôs dominance in web search, as 90% of tokenized assets reside on Ethereum, just as Google handles 90% of internet searches. Despite Keys‚Äô optimism and Ethereum‚Äôs impressive returns since its inception, some critics have pointed out that comparing Ethereum and Bitcoin on equal footing overlooks their different launch timelines. Bitcoin began trading in 2010 and gained over 234 million percent from its early days, while Ethereum launched in mid-2015 and has risen by more than 236,000%. Additionally, Ethereum is still down 24% from its all-time high in 2021, while Bitcoin recently hit a new peak in July. ETH‚Äôs all-time price action (Source: CoinMarketCap ) The Ether Machine is expected to go public via a merger with special purpose acquisition company Dynamix Corporation. The combined firm will trade on the Nasdaq and plans to provide large-scale institutional exposure to Ethereum. According to BTSE COO Jeff Mei , investors are already rotating heavily into Ethereum, helping to fuel its recent rally.

HEADLINE: These XRP Price Predictions Will Make You Think
SUMMARY: The past 24 hours saw the broader cryptocurrency market go through a slight correction, with the total capitalization dropping below $4 trillion. This comes on the back of a decline in Bitcoin‚Äôs price, which is down 1.3% during the period. As it‚Äôs almost always the case, altcoin performance is directly correlated with that of BTC but typically a lot more pronounced. That‚Äôs what we saw today as well. ETH dropped by 4.5%, DOGE ‚Äì by 4.7%, ADA ‚Äì by 4.6%, and XRP ‚Äì by almost 4%. But as the native coin behind the XRPL corrects, analysts are taking the opportunity to present some price predictions. Technical XRP Price Predictions As CryptoPotato reported , prominent and popular analyst Ali Martinez shared a chart, indicating that XRP might be on its way to the $6 mark. To come to this price level, Martinez used Fibonacci levels drawn from the previous move. They indicat $4.17, $4.63, and $5.01 as points where the buyers might meet serious resistance. The final extension of his analysis indicates $6.12 as a target. Another trader, going by the CRYPTOWZRD moniker presented his technical outlook. Yesterday, he wrote: The intraday chart was somewhat volatile today and should remain so tomorrow. Our current position is secure. Moving above the $3.65 intraday resistance target will trigger the next long opportunity. $3.4 is the main intraday support target. We will have to wait for the market to form the next healthy trade setup. In the attached chart, the analyst presents $4.6 as the ‚Äúnext major target.‚Äù Source: X Somewhat in line with these was the comment of Cobb, who said that: XRP $5 is coming so fast. You will blink one day and it‚Äôs just gonna be $5 per coin.‚Äù What is Driving the Current Positive XRP Price Momentum? Regardless of the slight correction, the community is relatively unanimous ‚Äì sentiment is positive. But what‚Äôs behind the recent price movements? Well, for once, the legal battle between the United States Securities and Exchange Commission and Ripple Labs has more or less been resolved. The company has withdrawn its cross appeal and expects that SEC will do the same, effectively marking the end of the lawsuit. On the other hand, Ripple is a native US company and the country has done quite a bit under the presidency of Donald Trump with regards to crypto regulations. For instance, just recently, the administration passed the GENIUS Act, considered to be the first major national regulatory framework creating clearer rules for the growing industry, especially when it comes to stablecoins. Recall that Ripple also launched a USD-pegged coin called RLUSD and even tapped the country‚Äôs oldest bank ‚Äì BNY Mellown to serve as a global partner and custodian. According to CoinGecko, RLUSD currenty has a market cap of around $530 million. The post These XRP Price Predictions Will Make You Think appeared first on CryptoPotato .

HEADLINE: Tornado Cash Co-Founder May Seek Mistrial Over Witness Testimony
SUMMARY: Tornado Cash co-founder Roman Storm‚Äôs legal team may seek a mistrial , arguing that a government witness‚Äôs testimony has no connection to the crypto mixer case. The potential request was raised before Manhattan federal judge Katherine Polk Failla on Monday, questioning the validity of the testimony provided by government witness Hanfeng Lin, Inner City Press reported . If granted, a mistrial would render the current proceedings invalid, either dismissing the case or requiring a retrial with a new judge and jury. Storm was charged in 2023 with money laundering conspiracy, conspiracy to violate U.S. sanctions, and operating an unlicensed money-transmitting business. He faces up to 45 years in prison. His co-founder, Roman Semenov, charged in the same case, remains in Russia and has not appeared in court. Disputed Testimony Over Crypto Scam Lin testified on Tuesday that she lost $190,000 in a crypto romance scam that began on WhatsApp in 2022. She described how a scammer convinced her to purchase Bitcoin and send it to a fraudulent trading platform that falsely displayed high returns, prompting her to send more funds. Eventually, the scammer disappeared with the funds. Lin said that Payback, a crypto recovery service she hired, informed her that some of her stolen Bitcoin had passed through Tornado Cash. However, Storm‚Äôs lawyer, David Patton, stated that their research over the weekend could not find any evidence linking Lin‚Äôs funds to Tornado Cash, indicating the defence would consider moving for a mistrial due to this testimony. Crypto Sleuths Challenge Connection to Tornado Cash FBI Special Agent Joseph DeCapua, a government crypto tracing expert, testified regarding the general flow of crypto from hacks into Tornado Cash but confirmed under cross-examination that he had not reviewed Lin‚Äôs transactions specifically. The prosecution indicated it would bring in IRS analyst Stephan George to prove Lin‚Äôs funds touched Tornado Cash. Meanwhile, independent blockchain researchers have cast doubt on Lin‚Äôs claims. MetaMask security researcher Taylor Monahan posted on X that her analysis showed the scammers who stole Lin‚Äôs funds did not use Tornado Cash. She explained that the scammers converted Lin‚Äôs Bitcoin to Ether, and the transactions were mistakenly flagged by Payback due to bundling errors onchain. Prominent blockchain investigator ZachXBT supported Monahan‚Äôs findings, criticising Payback‚Äôs tracing work, noting that the firm had followed incorrect transaction paths, leading to an inaccurate claim that Lin‚Äôs funds interacted with Tornado Cash. The post Tornado Cash Co-Founder May Seek Mistrial Over Witness Testimony appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

HEADLINE: Altcoins on the Rise: Is BTC Losing Grip or Winding Up for a Surge to $150K?
SUMMARY: The Altcoin Season Index has breached above the key threshold of 50, signalling that Bitcoin''s dominance in the crypto world is being questioned. Smaller digital currencies gain momentum. Market dynamics are shifting, raising the question of whether Bitcoin is weakening or preparing for a massive rally. Outset PR , where crypto-native communication converges with data-driven intelligence, powers this content. Bitcoin Eyes a New High as It Hovers in a Stable Range Source: tradingview Bitcoin is currently trading between 114,000 and one 121,000 dollars. It''s closely inching toward its nearest resistance level at about 125,000 dollars. Over the past month, Bitcoin has seen a positive climb of over 14%. If this upward trend continues past the first resistance level, it could potentially stretch to the 131,000 dollar mark, which would signify a growth of around 8% from its current top price. The relative stability shown by recent indicators suggests a positive sentiment among traders, fueling hopes for further gains. Outset PR Crafts Communications Like a Workshop, Powered by Data Founded by renowned crypto PR expert Mike Ermolaev , Outset PR operates like a hands-on workshop, building every campaign with market fit in mind. Daily media analytics and trend monitoring power every decision, so campaigns align with market momentum. HEADLINE: Goldman Sachs Spots Ominous Economic Signal Brewing in China, Creating Headwinds for 2025 Growth: Report
SUMMARY: The financial giant Goldman Sachs is reportedly issuing a warning after spotting an ominous economic metric in China. A new tracker from Goldman economists indicates wages in China grew by only 3.9% from the second quarter of 2024, the lowest growth in Chinese recorded history, excluding the pandemic years, Bloomberg reports . The Goldman economists also note that the figure is roughly a percentage point less than official Chinese government statistics. ‚ÄúOur wage tracker suggests that sluggish wage growth may impose headwinds to consumption growth in the second half of 2025. We anticipate incremental and targeted easing measures in the second half of the year to alleviate labor market pressures.‚Äù Source: Bloomberg Ernan Cui, a China consumer analyst at the investment research firm Gavekal, says in a report reviewed by Bloomberg that Chinese workers are shifting toward self-employment because there are few available formal jobs in the country‚Äôs labor force. Cui also reportedly says that the Chinese government‚Äôs statistics bureau is counting those self-employed workers, but she notes that they may not be counted in surveys of large companies. ‚ÄúThe data indicate that China‚Äôs labor market has been consistently weak, despite a broadly stable headline unemployment rate. Until the labor market truly tightens, it seems unlikely that household confidence will rebound.‚Äù Follow us on X , Facebook and Telegram Don''t Miss a Beat ‚Äì Subscribe to get email alerts delivered directly to your inbox Check Price Action Surf The Daily Hodl Mix Disclaimer: Opinions expressed at The Daily Hodl are not investment advice. HEADLINE: Cathie Wood''s Ark Invest bought 4.4M Bitmine shares as ETH rallies
SUMMARY: Cathie Wood is back at it again, making a strategic move with ARK Invest in its crypto strategy. The fresh disclosure shows that the firm acquired over 4.4 million shares of Bitmine Immersion Technologies (BMNR), an Ethereum treasury firm. However, the purchase worth around $175 million was spread across three of ARK‚Äôs ETFs. This comes in when Ethereum is running high on bullish waves, gaining more than 25% in the last 7 days. This surge has pushed the largest altcoin to outperform Bitcoin (BTC) over the past 90 days. ETH went on to reclaim the crucial $3,800 mark long after December 2024. Cathie Wood goes long on Ethereum According to ARK Invest‚Äôs July 21 trade disclosure, the firm scooped 2.9 million shares of BMNR through its flagship ARK Innovation ETF (ARKK). It added 927.8K shares via ARKW and 555.7K via ARKF. This can be seen as ARK‚Äôs first major move into Bitmine since the company announced it was turning away from Bitcoin and building a massive Ethereum treasury. Bitmine is now holding over $1 billion in ETH after a recent $500 million purchase. It reportedly plans to acquire and stake 5% of the total Ethereum supply. The ETH staking announcement led Bitmine stock to soar more than to an all-time high of $135 before cooling to around $39. It is still up by almost 800% over the past month. After-hours trading session shows that BMNR is expected to gain by 2% when the market opens. ARK‚Äôs move highlights a strong trend among institutional players and a shift from BTC to ETH amid rising momentum for ETH-based ETFs and treasury strategies. As of now, ARK‚Äôs Bitcoin ETF ARKB holds $5.81 billion of BTC. Source: ARK Invest Daily . Ethereum price recorded a minor correction of 4% on Tuesday morning after a brief rally. ETH is trading at an average price of $3,660 at press time. Its 24-hour trading volume is down by 4.5% to stand at $44.5 billion. The digital assets market remained calm as it lost 2% of the gains over the last 24 hours. The cumulative crypto market cap stood at $3.89 trillion with a trading volume of $218 billion. Bitcoin price hovers around $117K-$118K. ARK ditches old favorites Cathie Wood‚Äôs ARK simultaneously sold 218,986 Coinbase shares (approx. worth $90 million) across three ETFs. It moved ahead to offload 463,293 shares of gaming firm Roblox (approx. worth $57.7 million). Meanwhile, it also made reductions in Robinhood and Block. While the ARKK fund remains heavily weighted toward tech names like Tesla (9.7% of the portfolio), Coinbase and Roblox are still its second and third largest holdings, with a 5% allocation to Circle. On July 15, ARK continued to build its Tesla position, purchasing 115,380 shares worth $36.5 million split across ARKK and ARKW. HEADLINE: Bitcoin ‚Äòcould march toward $131k‚Äô, says crypto expert
SUMMARY: Bitcoin ( BTC ) has been hotly debated in the past weeks, as it managed to hit a new all-time high (ATH) above $123,000 and become the fifth-largest asset by market capitalization. Contributing to the discussion, crypto market analyst Ali Martinez, suggested in a July 22 post on X that the coin could be on track to surge even further. According to Martinez, Bitcoin could march toward $131,200, provided it maintains a critical support level at $117,400. Ali Martinez‚Äôs BTC chart. Source: X (@ali_charts) Bitcoin performance Bitcoin faces technical resistance in the $118,500‚Äì$123,000 range, and a break above this zone could set the stage for a rally toward a price of up to $135,000. The ‚Äòdigital gold‚Äô currently trades at $118,050, down 0.76% in the past 24 hours but well above its 30-day simple moving average of $111,700. Still, momentum indicators advise caution. The moving average convergence divergence ( MACD ) histogram, for instance, recently turned negative (-28.56), hinting at potential near-term consolidation. BTC 24-hour price. Source: Finbold However, as per the same data, Bitcoin‚Äôs road to $135,000 may hinge on whether exchange-traded fund ( ETF ) flows and corporate adoption can overpower resistance near $123,000. If not, a pullback toward support at $115,000 is also likely. Is Ethereum $10,000 also possible? In another post , Martinez suggested Ethereum ( ETH ) could be poised for a major breakout toward $10,000 if it can decisively breach a critical resistance level around $4,000. Quote : ‚ÄúIf Ethereum $ETH can break past $4,000, we could be looking at $10,000 next!‚Äù The analyst pointed to a long-standing Parallel Channel pattern on Ethereum‚Äôs weekly chart. Defined by two horizontal trendlines, the pattern has confined ETH‚Äôs price action in a sideways range for over two years. Historically, the upper boundary has acted as a strong resistance zone, repeatedly rejecting ETH‚Äôs attempts to move higher. Featured image via Shutterstock The post Bitcoin ‚Äòcould march toward $131k‚Äô, says crypto expert appeared first on Finbold .

HEADLINE: Bitcoin ETFs Hit a Quake! BTC Breaks 13-Day Inflow Streak, Ethereum ETFs Reach Record Highs! Here''s the Latest on BTC and ETH ETFs!
SUMMARY: The leading cryptocurrency Bitcoin (BTC) made a big move recently and broke a new record by rising above $123,000. After this ATH, BTC price has retreated and continues to consolidate at the $117,000-$118,000 level. While the pullback in BTC price had a negative impact on spot Bitcoin ETFs, the 13-day entry streak in US spot Bitcoin ETFs was broken, according to data. Accordingly, after a 13-day inflow series, net outflows were seen in spot BTC ETFs yesterday. According to Farside Investors data, a total of $131.4 million outflow occurred yesterday from spot Bitcoin ETFs traded in the US. Ark Invest‚Äôs ARKB fund saw the largest outflow with $77.5 million, followed by Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC fund with $36.7 million, Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC fund with $12.8 million, VanEck‚Äôs HODL fund with $2.5 million, and Bitwise‚Äôs BITB fund with $1.91 million. On the other hand, BlackRock''s IBIT fund, Invesco''s BTCO fund, Franklin''s EZBC fund, Valkyrie''s BRRR fund, and WisdomTree''s BTCW fund recorded no net inflows or outflows. Ethereum Logins Continue! In contrast to net outflows in Bitcoin, inflows continued in US spot Ethereum ETFs, with net inflows of $298.06 million in a single day. According to Farside Investors data, Fidelity''s FETH fund was the ETF with the highest inflows, with $126.9 million. BlackRock''s ETHA fund followed with $102 million, while Grayscale''s ETH fund saw inflows of $54.9 million and Bitwise''s ETHW fund saw inflows of $13.1 million. In comparison, 21Shares‚Äô CETH fund experienced $0.4 million in outflows, while other ETH ETFs recorded no net inflows or outflows. The total net inflow of $298.06 million in US-traded Ethereum spot ETFs marks an all-time high in terms of trading volume. Additionally, spot ETH ETFs experienced their most significant inflows since their launch on July 24. At this point, ETH ETFs recorded a total of $3.53 billion in net inflows over the past 12-day period, with daily inflows outpacing Bitcoin ETFs for several days. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Bitcoin ETFs Hit a Quake! BTC Breaks 13-Day Inflow Streak, Ethereum ETFs Reach Record Highs! Here''s the Latest on BTC and ETH ETFs!

HEADLINE: Hyperliquid Whale Makes Audacious $200M Bitcoin Bet
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Hyperliquid Whale Makes Audacious $200M Bitcoin Bet The cryptocurrency market is a dynamic arena, often influenced by the seismic shifts of its largest players. Imagine a colossal ripple effect caused by a single, monumental trade. This is precisely what unfolded recently on Hyperliquid, a prominent decentralized exchange, as a formidable Hyperliquid whale made a breathtaking pivot, signaling a potentially significant shift in market sentiment. This dramatic move, from a substantial Ethereum (ETH) loss to an colossal Bitcoin (BTC) long position, has sent murmurs across the digital asset landscape, leaving many to ponder the implications of such an audacious bet. Understanding the Hyperliquid Whale‚Äôs Pivotal Move In the high-stakes world of crypto trading, every move by a ‚Äòwhale‚Äô ‚Äì an individual or entity holding a significant amount of cryptocurrency ‚Äì is scrutinized. The recent actions of a particular Hyperliquid whale , identified by blockchain analytics firm Lookonchain as ‚ÄòAguilaTrades,‚Äô have certainly captured the market‚Äôs attention. This whale‚Äôs journey highlights both the inherent risks and the immense potential rewards within the volatile crypto ecosystem. Initially, AguilaTrades was positioned with a substantial Ethereum long, a bet on ETH‚Äôs price appreciation. However, market dynamics proved challenging, leading to a significant setback: Ethereum Long Closure: The whale closed their ETH long position, incurring a loss estimated to be around $3 million. This substantial loss underscores the unpredictable nature of leveraged trading, even for seasoned participants. Strategic Capital Injection: Following the ETH loss, AguilaTrades swiftly deposited an additional 5.28 million USDC (USD Coin) to their Hyperliquid account. This immediate replenishment of capital signals strong conviction and readiness for the next strategic play, demonstrating deep pockets and a willingness to double down. This initial phase reveals a trader who is not deterred by losses but rather recalibrates and repositions with conviction, a hallmark often seen in professional trading circles. The ability to absorb a multi-million dollar loss and immediately inject fresh capital is a testament to the scale of operations this Hyperliquid whale commands. The Audacious Bitcoin Long Position: A Deeper Dive The subsequent action by the Hyperliquid whale was nothing short of monumental. After replenishing their capital, AguilaTrades pivoted sharply, shifting focus from Ethereum to Bitcoin with an aggressive, leveraged bet. This move was not just a change in asset; it was a dramatic increase in exposure and risk. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of this colossal Bitcoin trade: Asset Shift: From Ethereum to Bitcoin, signaling a potential belief in Bitcoin‚Äôs near-term strength or a hedge against broader market uncertainty. Leverage Applied: A staggering 20x leverage was used. This means that for every dollar of their own capital, the whale borrowed an additional nineteen dollars, amplifying both potential gains and potential losses twentyfold. Position Size: The long position was opened for 1,695 BTC, equivalent to approximately $200.5 million at the time of the trade. This makes it one of the largest single leveraged trades observed on Hyperliquid, showcasing the immense scale of this Hyperliquid whale‚Äôs conviction. Such a massive bet by a Hyperliquid whale often sends ripples through the market, influencing sentiment and potentially even triggering follow-on trades from other large players or algorithmic systems. It highlights the concentrated nature of wealth and influence within the crypto space, indicating strong conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs immediate future. A significant move by a Hyperliquid whale. Decoding Whale Activity: Why It Matters Understanding the movements of a Hyperliquid whale is crucial for any participant in the crypto market, from seasoned traders to casual investors. Whales, by definition, hold enough assets to significantly influence market prices. Their trades, especially large leveraged positions, can act as leading indicators or, at times, self-fulfilling prophecies. Here‚Äôs why whale activity is so important: Market Impact: Large buy or sell orders can directly move prices, especially in less liquid assets. Even in highly liquid markets like Bitcoin, a $200 million position can create significant price pressure. Sentiment Indicator: Whale movements can signal underlying sentiment. A massive long position might suggest institutional optimism, while significant selling could indicate a bearish outlook. Liquidation Cascades: Highly leveraged positions, if they go wrong, can trigger cascading liquidations, exacerbating price swings. However, it‚Äôs vital to remember that not all whale movements are infallible. Whales can, and do, make mistakes, as evidenced by AguilaTrades‚Äô $3 million ETH loss. Retail traders should observe, but not blindly follow, these massive trades. The financial capacity and risk tolerance of a Hyperliqui

HEADLINE: Why Pi Coin Price Is Up Today?
SUMMARY: The post Why Pi Coin Price Is Up Today? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Pi Network coin price has surprised many traders today by rising nearly 8% and reaching a price of about $0.487 . This recent surge has caught the attention of many as the entire cryptocurrency market is trading in red. What‚Äôs behind this sudden price jump? Some say it‚Äôs because of new developments, while others point to growing interest in the coin. Let‚Äôs find it out! Pi Network Sees Developer Boom The recent surge in Pi Network coin is attributed to the recently launched App Studio. This tool has already helped people build over 8000 apps . So far, 2.6 million users joined in, and around 761,000 have finished all the steps to launch their ideas. The staking feature is also adding fuel. More than 37.7 million Pi coins have been staked to support over 1,450 apps, backed by 16,000 users. Meanwhile, popular projects like Healthy Life, BLACKHOLE, and FlapPi Bird show what‚Äôs possible. Secret Whale Wallet Draws Attention At the same time, a mystery Pi whale wallet has people talking. This wallet has quietly collected 331 million Pi coins, worth about $148 million , even while prices dropped. Known by the address GAS‚Ä¶ODM, the wallet has moved huge amounts of Pi from exchanges like OKX, MEXC, and Gate.io in the last three months. This has sparked new questions about what might come next for Pi Network. Breaking Free From Bitcoin‚Äôs Grip It‚Äôs no secret that the whole crypto market has always danced to Bitcoin‚Äôs tune. When Bitcoin rises, most other coins rise too. When it drops, they usually fall. But Pi Network is starting to break away from this old pattern. Its recent boost didn‚Äôt come because Bitcoin spiked. Instead, Pi‚Äôs momentum came from inside, its team, its vision, and its growing community. This marks a big shift. Many other coins have tried to stand on their own, but few have done it with real use cases. Pi is different, it‚Äôs not just about hype or price charts. That Leg Up from Dr. Nicolas (a.k.a. Satoshi) Means A Lot Pi Is Starting to Take Its Own Path Let‚Äôs be honest ‚Äî that recent leg up from Dr. Nicolas hit different. Whether it was a quiet behind-the-scenes push or a calculated move by the Core Team, it showed us something‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/UuXli0Gzzn ‚Äî Mr Spock ùõë (@MrSpockApe) July 22, 2025 Real People, Real Utility One thing that makes Pi stand out is what people are doing with it. Real stores are accepting Pi as payment. Developers are launching apps built just for Pi users. And the new Desktop App Studio makes it easier for everyday people to build tools for Pi‚Äôs growing world. These actions prove that Pi isn‚Äôt waiting for Bitcoin to lead. It‚Äôs building its path, brick by brick. That push from Dr. Nicolas was more than a simple update, it reminded everyone that Pi‚Äôs mission is alive and moving forward. It‚Äôs about creating a digital currency that everyday people can use in their daily lives, not just hold and hope.

HEADLINE: EUR/USD Forecast: Crucial Insights into Bearish Momentum
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld EUR/USD Forecast: Crucial Insights into Bearish Momentum In the dynamic world of financial markets, understanding currency movements is as crucial as tracking digital assets. While your primary focus might be on Bitcoin or Ethereum, the traditional Forex Market Analysis , particularly of major pairs like EUR/USD, often provides a foundational understanding of global economic health and investor sentiment. This broader financial landscape can indirectly influence the liquidity and stability of the cryptocurrency space. Recently, ING, a prominent financial institution, highlighted a significant development concerning the EUR/USD pair: it lacks sufficient bullish momentum. What does this mean for the world‚Äôs most traded currency pair, and how might it impact your broader financial perspective? Decoding the Latest EUR/USD Forecast from ING ING‚Äôs recent assessment paints a cautious picture for the Euro against the US Dollar. The core of their argument revolves around a persistent lack of strong buying interest, suggesting that any upward movements are likely to be temporary and fragile. This outlook is not just a passing observation; it stems from a careful evaluation of various economic and policy indicators that continue to favor the US Dollar over the Euro. Economic Divergence: The US economy has shown remarkable resilience, often outperforming its European counterparts. Stronger labor markets and more robust consumer spending in the US create a more attractive environment for investment, drawing capital towards dollar-denominated assets. Interest Rate Differentials: Central bank policies play a pivotal role. While both the European Central Bank (ECB) and the Federal Reserve (Fed) have grappled with inflation, the Fed‚Äôs stance on interest rates has often been perceived as more hawkish or adaptable, leading to higher yields on US bonds compared to Eurozone bonds. This yield differential makes the Dollar more appealing to investors seeking better returns. Geopolitical Risks: Ongoing geopolitical tensions, particularly in Europe, can weigh heavily on investor confidence in the Eurozone. Uncertainty often drives investors towards perceived safe-haven assets, and the US Dollar frequently benefits from this flight to safety. Forex Market Analysis : What‚Äôs Driving the Stagnation? Beyond ING‚Äôs specific points, a broader Forex Market Analysis reveals several systemic factors contributing to the EUR/USD‚Äôs struggle to find bullish momentum. These elements interact in complex ways, creating a challenging environment for the Euro. Inflation and Central Bank Policies Inflation remains a key determinant of central bank actions. In the Eurozone, while inflation has been a concern, the ECB has often adopted a more cautious approach to rate hikes compared to the Fed. This divergence in monetary policy philosophies directly impacts currency valuations. When a central bank signals a readiness to maintain higher rates for longer, its currency typically strengthens as it offers better returns for holding that currency. Consider the following comparison: Factor US Economy (USD) Eurozone Economy (EUR) Economic Growth Generally resilient, often outpacing Mixed, slower recovery in some areas Interest Rate Policy More aggressive/adaptive hikes More cautious/gradual hikes Inflation Trends Persistent, but showing signs of cooling Varied, but often stubborn in core components Labor Market Strong, low unemployment Varied, higher unemployment in some member states This table highlights the fundamental differences that can influence capital flows and, consequently, currency strength. Understanding the Euro Dollar Outlook : Key Levels and Resistance For traders and investors, understanding the technical landscape is as important as fundamental analysis. The current Euro Dollar Outlook suggests that key resistance levels are proving difficult for the pair to breach, reinforcing the bearish sentiment. These levels act as ceilings, where selling pressure tends to increase, preventing significant upward movement. Resistance Levels: Analysts often identify specific price points where the currency pair has struggled to advance in the past. Repeated failures to break above these levels signal a lack of buying conviction. For EUR/USD, these might be psychological levels like 1.0900 or 1.1000, or specific technical indicators. Support Levels: Conversely, support levels are price points where buying interest tends to emerge, preventing further declines. However, if these support levels are broken, it can signal a continuation of the bearish trend. Potential Scenarios: In a market lacking bullish momentum, common scenarios include consolidation (trading within a narrow range) or a gradual downtrend. Sharp upward moves are often quickly corrected, indicating that traders are quick to sell into strength. Currency Trading Insights : Navigating the Choppy Waters Given the current Euro Dollar Outlook , what are the actionable Currency Trading In

HEADLINE: Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Has Already Delivered 2√ó for Early Buyers, More Gains Coming
SUMMARY: Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is turning heads in the crypto space with an impressive start for early investors. Those who jumped in during Phase 2 bought tokens at just $0.015, and the price has since doubled to $0.03. This early return has sparked growing excitement around the project as it moves forward, especially with 87% of Phase 5 tokens already sold. Backed by a strong CertiK audit scoring 95 on Token Scan and 77.5 on Skynet, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is gaining trust and momentum among investors looking for a reliable and scalable DeFi solution. Milestones Unfolding: From Smart Contracts to Beta Testing Mutuum Finance (MUTM)‚Äôs journey is carefully mapped out, with each phase building on solid foundations. In Phase 2, the team focuses on developing the core smart contracts, front-end, and back-end infrastructure that will power the platform‚Äôs lending and borrowing features. These smart contracts are designed with security and efficiency in mind, ensuring smooth operation when the platform goes live. Looking ahead, Phase 3 will bring the much-anticipated beta launch. This testnet release will enable users to explore the platform‚Äôs features and provide valuable feedback through a structured bug reporting system. Alongside the beta, preparations for exchange listings are underway, which will boost liquidity and allow a broader range of investors to participate. These strategic milestones highlight Mutuum Finance (MUTM)‚Äôs disciplined and transparent approach to development, laying the groundwork for sustained growth. A key differentiator in Mutuum Finance (MUTM)‚Äôs upcoming lending ecosystem is its planned dual model: P2C (Peer-to-Contract) and P2P (Peer-to-Peer) lending. In the future, a user lending $20,000 worth MATIC at a 65% loan-to-value (LTV) ratio could receive $1,840 earning at an APY of 9.2%, automatically compounded on-chain. This would reward lenders with passive income while maintaining liquidity. On the borrowing side, high-risk memecoins like DOGE are expected to be accepted as collateral in the P2P model. A borrower putting up $100,000 worth of DOGE at a 30% LTV could access a $30,000 USDC loan, gaining quick liquidity without selling their tokens. This flexibility is designed to attract a wide user base, from cautious lenders to active traders. By shifting operations to Layer 2, the platform reduces gas fees by a huge percentage, a significant improvement over traditional Layer 1 networks. This reduction in transaction costs removes a major barrier for smaller investors and frequent users, opening the door to more inclusive DeFi participation. Lower fees and faster transaction speeds will allow Mutuum Finance (MUTM) to handle larger volumes without congestion, improving the user experience and attracting more participants. This scalability advantage will be crucial as the platform prepares to launch its beta and mainnet, positioning it to compete with established DeFi protocols on both usability and efficiency. HEADLINE: Unlocking the EUR/GBP Risk Premium: ING‚Äôs Crucial Insights for Astute Traders
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Unlocking the EUR/GBP Risk Premium: ING‚Äôs Crucial Insights for Astute Traders Even in the fast-paced world of digital assets, understanding the nuances of traditional financial markets, like the foreign exchange (forex) market, remains crucial. Just as Bitcoin and Ethereum react to global sentiment, major currency pairs like EUR/GBP are constantly influenced by economic forces. Recently, ING, a prominent financial institution, highlighted a significant development: markets are attaching a notable EUR/GBP risk premium . This phenomenon, while seemingly distant from your crypto portfolio, offers valuable insights into broader market sentiment, capital flows, and the underlying economic health of major global economies. Let‚Äôs delve into what this risk premium signifies, why it‚Äôs emerging, and what it could mean for the financial landscape. What is the EUR/GBP Risk Premium and Why Does it Matter? At its core, a risk premium is the additional return an investor demands for taking on a higher level of risk. In the context of currency pairs like EUR/GBP, it means that market participants are requiring more compensation to hold one currency over another, specifically the British Pound (GBP) over the Euro (EUR), due to perceived higher risks associated with the UK economy. When ING states that a risk premium is being attached to the EUR/GBP pair, it suggests that the market is pricing in a greater degree of uncertainty or potential downside for the Pound relative to the Euro. Why does this matter for anyone, even those primarily interested in crypto? Because currency movements are a fundamental barometer of a nation‚Äôs economic health and its attractiveness for investment. A rising risk premium on GBP indicates that global investors view the UK as a riskier place to invest or hold assets compared to the Eurozone. This can have far-reaching implications: Investment Flows: Higher risk might deter foreign direct investment into the UK, impacting economic growth. Trade Dynamics: A weaker Pound, driven by risk premium, can make UK exports cheaper but imports more expensive, affecting inflation and consumer purchasing power. Inflationary Pressures: If a weaker Pound pushes up import costs, it can exacerbate domestic inflation, creating a challenging environment for the Bank of England. Policy Decisions: Central banks closely monitor currency strength and risk premiums as they inform monetary policy decisions, such as interest rate adjustments. Broader Market Sentiment: The sentiment around major currency pairs often reflects global risk appetite. A significant risk premium on a G10 currency like GBP can signal underlying economic stress that could spill over into other asset classes. Understanding this premium is crucial for anyone seeking a holistic view of financial markets, as it provides a lens through which to interpret macro-economic trends and their potential impact on all asset classes, including the volatile world of cryptocurrencies. ING Market Insights : Decoding the Drivers ING‚Äôs analysis points to specific factors contributing to this elevated EUR/GBP risk premium . Their insights typically stem from a deep dive into macroeconomic data, central bank rhetoric, and geopolitical developments affecting both the UK and the Eurozone. While the exact details of ING‚Äôs latest report would provide precise figures, the general drivers for such a premium often include: Persistent UK Inflation: The UK has faced stubbornly high inflation, often outstripping that of the Eurozone. This puts the Bank of England (BoE) in a difficult position, balancing the need to tame inflation with concerns about economic growth. Higher, more persistent inflation can erode purchasing power and make a currency less attractive. Economic Growth Disparity: Concerns about the UK‚Äôs economic growth prospects, including the risk of recession, can weigh heavily on the Pound. If the Eurozone is perceived to have more resilient or stable growth, capital might flow from the UK to the Eurozone, demanding a premium for holding GBP. Monetary Policy Divergence: While both the BoE and the European Central Bank (ECB) have been tightening monetary policy, the market‚Äôs perception of their respective trajectories and effectiveness can create divergence. If the market believes the BoE might have to pause or reverse hikes sooner than the ECB, or if its actions are seen as less effective, it can weaken the Pound. Brexit‚Äôs Lingering Impact: The long-term economic consequences of Brexit, including trade barriers, labor shortages, and reduced foreign investment, continue to cast a shadow over the UK economy. These structural issues can contribute to a persistent risk premium. Geopolitical and Energy Shocks: Both regions are susceptible to global events, but their resilience and exposure can differ. For instance, the energy crisis affected both, but the UK‚Äôs unique energy market structure or trade relationships might make it more vulnerable in certain scena

HEADLINE: Analyst Says XRP Investors Are Getting Ripped Off ‚Äî Here‚Äôs Why
SUMMARY: Over the last few weeks, XRP has creeped up slowly but surely to become one of the most talked-about cryptocurrencies in the space. Its price has also risen steadily through this time, beating the $3.6 level to reach new seven-year highs and triggering momentum for higher prices. While the community celebrates this milestone, there is the fact that the altcoin has not made a new all-time high, and even with all of the recent push, its inability to reach new peaks has become a cause for concern. Are XRP Investors Getting The Short End Of The Stick? In a TradingView post, crypto analyst ICharted made a shocking allegation, namely that¬†XRP investors are being¬†ripped off. The analyst pointed out that the fact that a number of bullish developments have emerged in recent times and the XRP price is still sitting well below its all-time high levels shows that investors were getting the short end of the stick. Related Reading: Dogecoin Whale Bets $21 Million After $2.14M Profit ‚Äì What‚Äôs Going On? The analyst listed out seven developments that have been bullish for the XRP price and should‚Äôve already pushed it to new peaks. First on the list is the election of US President Donald Trump, who is the first pro-crypto president in history. Despite the market surge triggered by Trump‚Äôs election, XRP has remained well below its all-time highs. Next on the list is the fact that the Ripple case brought by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) in 2020 is nearing its end, and this has also triggered a surge. But it was still not enough for new peaks. This also comes amid mass adoption as Ripple becomes the foremost crypto settlement company in the industry. ICharted also pointed out the myriad of partnerships that Ripple has inked, spanning from payments to real estate, and yet the XRP price continues to struggle. This has put XRP in the eye of the public, making it a well-known cryptocurrency, especially as it plans to take on SWIFT, but it is still sitting below all-time highs. Related Reading: Bitcoin Re-Enters Profit Zone As Greed Rises, But Rally To $200,000 Still Possible The rise in the volume in the past year is another development the analyst points to, as well as the fact that it was able to receive an ETF approval this year, which began trading last week. Then, last but not least, is the fact that the US Congress has passed multiple favourable crypto bills this year, and yet the XRP price remains below its 2018 peaks. Given that none of these have been able to push the XRP price to new all-time highs, the analyst warned investors that they are being ripped up on the price action. ICharted pointed to a possible price crash back to the $2 level soon, predicting that a free fall will begin in August. ‚ÄúThe Feds are soon going to cut rates multiple times. Bitcoin tanks everytime that happens,‚Äù the analyst warned. Featured image from Dall.E, chart from TradingView.com

HEADLINE: Bitcoin-Backed Loans Are Reshaping Traditional Lending
SUMMARY: Bitcoin-backed lending is going mainstream as banks, DeFi protocols, and institutions adopt BTC as collateral, giving investors liquidity without selling.
text: Bitcoin-Backed Loans Are Reshaping Traditional Lending. Bitcoin-backed lending is going mainstream as banks, DeFi protocols, and institutions adopt BTC as collateral, giving investors liquidity without selling.

HEADLINE: JPMorgan plans to offer loans backed by Bitcoin and Ethereum
SUMMARY: World‚Äôs largest bank, JPMorgan Chase, is weighing plans for a new policy that would allow it to lend against clients‚Äô cryptocurrency holdings, signaling a major turning point in the traditional banking sector‚Äôs embrace of digital assets. The move would represent a sharp reversal for CEO Jamie Dimon, who infamously called Bitcoin a ‚Äúfraud‚Äù in 2017 and claimed it was only useful to ‚Äúdrug dealers and murderers.‚Äù According to people familiar with the matter, JPMorgan could begin offering crypto-collateralized loans as early as next year, although the plans remain subject to change. The bank declined to comment. Dimon softens crypto stance as JPMorgan expands push into digital assets If the initiative is implemented, it would allow clients to borrow against assets like Bitcoin and Ethereum‚Äîmarking the clearest indication yet that Wall Street giants are integrating cryptocurrencies into their core services. It would also put JPMorgan ahead of competitors like Goldman Sachs , which has yet to accept crypto as collateral. In recent years, Dimon has tempered his stance. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think you should smoke, but I defend your right to smoke. I defend your right to buy Bitcoin. Go at it,‚Äù he said in May. His earlier comments, which included threats to fire traders who dabbled in crypto, reportedly alienated potential clients who had built wealth through digital assets or held strong convictions in the sector‚Äôs long-term potential. JPMorgan has already dipped into crypto through plans to lend against holdings in crypto exchange-traded funds (ETFs). However, lending against the digital tokens themselves would be a significant leap, especially as regulatory sentiment in Washington shifts. Stablecoin legislation spurs Wall Street interest The House of Representatives recently passed the first major crypto legislation to regulate stablecoins ‚Äîdigital tokens pegged to fiat currencies like the US dollar‚Äîwhich large banks have welcomed as a gateway to easier digital asset operations. Other firms are following suit. Morgan Stanley is weighing crypto trading options via its E*Trade platform, and broader institutional interest has picked up amid expectations that a second Trump administration could bring looser oversight than President Biden‚Äôs policies. Still, hurdles remain. A key concern for banks is managing money laundering risks and compliance obligations tied to cryptocurrencies. Additionally, JPMorgan must address technical challenges, such as managing seized collateral in case of loan defaults. Unlike most major banks, JPMorgan does not hold crypto directly on its balance sheet. Instead, it would likely work with a third-party custodian, such as Coinbase, to manage the assets. Still, hurdles remain. One of the biggest worries for banks is managing the risk of money laundering and the regulatory requirements associated with cryptocurrencies. And JPMorgan has to grapple with technological hurdles, like how to handle collateral confiscated from borrowers that fail to pay back their loans. In contrast to many other big banks, JPMorgan doesn‚Äôt keep crypto directly on its balance sheet. Instead, it would presumably use a third-party custodian, like Coinbase, to store the assets. Despite its cautious approach to mainstream cryptocurrencies, JPMorgan has long been active in the broader digital asset space. In 2019, it launched JPM Coin ‚Äîthe first digital token issued by a US bank, to streamline wholesale payments between institutional clients. Dimon recently said the bank plans to expand its role in stablecoins, including its own JPMorgan Deposit coin, although he has been skeptical of their advantages over traditional payment channels. Speaking during the bank‚Äôs Tuesday earnings call, Dimon stressed the need to understand and become an expert in the space, adding that stablecoins are part of a legitimate financial ecosystem. However, there‚Äôs a question over their practical use. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

HEADLINE: Figma IPO: Unveiling a Billion-Dollar Crypto-Friendly Future
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Figma IPO: Unveiling a Billion-Dollar Crypto-Friendly Future Are you ready for a fascinating convergence of cutting-edge design and the dynamic world of digital assets? The buzz around the Figma IPO is reaching a fever pitch, and it‚Äôs not just about a design software giant going public. This initial public offering holds a surprising twist that will undoubtedly pique the interest of anyone watching the cryptocurrency space. Figma, a company synonymous with collaborative design, is not only targeting a massive valuation but is also making significant moves into crypto, signaling a potentially transformative shift for the tech industry. Figma IPO: A Blockbuster Debut on the Horizon? The highly anticipated Figma IPO is set to make waves on the New York Stock Exchange. According to reports from the Financial Times, the design software powerhouse plans to raise a substantial sum, aiming for up to $1 billion. This ambitious target would catapult the company‚Äôs valuation to an impressive $16.5 billion, a figure that underscores its dominance in the design software market. For those keeping an eye on market trends, the specifics of the Figma IPO are compelling: Shares Offered: Nearly 40 million shares are expected to be made available to the public. Price Range: Each share is anticipated to be priced between $25 and $28. Target Valuation: A staggering $16.5 billion, reflecting investor confidence in Figma‚Äôs growth trajectory and market position. Capital Raise: Up to $1 billion, which will provide significant capital for future expansion, innovation, and strategic initiatives. Backed by some of the most prominent venture capital firms, Figma has demonstrated robust financial health. In the first quarter, the company reported an impressive $228 million in revenue and a healthy $45 million in net income. While the previous year saw a $732 million loss, this was largely attributed to a stock tender offer, a common financial maneuver, rather than operational deficiencies. This strong Q1 performance paints a positive picture for the impending Figma IPO , indicating a company with solid fundamentals and a clear path to profitability. The Adobe Saga: Paving the Way for Figma‚Äôs Independence The journey to the Figma IPO has been particularly eventful, marked by a significant turning point involving Adobe. For those unfamiliar, Adobe, another titan in the creative software industry, had previously attempted a colossal $20 billion takeover of Figma. This acquisition would have reshaped the design software landscape entirely, consolidating immense power under one roof. However, regulatory bodies stepped in, ultimately blocking the proposed acquisition due to antitrust concerns. This intervention, while initially a setback for Adobe, proved to be a pivotal moment for Figma. It essentially cleared the path for Figma to pursue its independent future, culminating in the current plans for the Figma IPO . This regulatory decision underscored Figma‚Äôs critical role in the market and its potential to thrive as a standalone entity, free from the constraints of a larger corporate structure. It also highlighted the growing scrutiny over tech mega-mergers, reinforcing the idea that innovation and competition are best served by a diverse ecosystem of players. Beyond the Figma IPO: Why Crypto Investments Matter Now, here‚Äôs where the story takes an intriguing turn, especially for our audience passionate about digital assets. Beyond the impressive financial figures and market valuations, the Figma IPO prospectus reveals a strategic move that sets it apart from many traditional tech companies: its foray into cryptocurrency investments. Figma currently holds a notable $70 million in a Bitcoin ETF. This isn‚Äôt just a casual investment; it‚Äôs a significant commitment that signals a broader embrace of digital assets within the company‚Äôs financial strategy. Why would a design software company like Figma invest in a Bitcoin ETF? There are several compelling reasons: Diversification: Like any savvy investor, companies seek to diversify their portfolios to mitigate risks and enhance returns. Bitcoin, despite its volatility, has shown potential as a store of value and a hedge against inflation. Strategic Foresight: Figma recognizes the growing importance and legitimacy of the digital asset space. Investing now could position them favorably for future developments in Web3 and blockchain technology. Innovation Alignment: As a company at the forefront of digital design, investing in cutting-edge financial technologies aligns with Figma‚Äôs innovative ethos. Future Growth: Holding crypto assets could be seen as a long-term growth play, leveraging the potential appreciation of digital currencies. Furthermore, Figma‚Äôs plans extend beyond just holding a Bitcoin ETF. The company has explicitly stated its intention to make more crypto investments in the future. This commitment suggests a deeper integration of digital assets into their treasury management

HEADLINE: Unexpected Endorsement from Bitcoin (BTC) Enemy Peter Schiff! "Sell This Altcoin, Buy Bitcoin!"
SUMMARY: An unexpected statement came from gold advocate Peter Schiff, who has made his name as the biggest Bitcoin enemy. Peter Schiff, who made a surprising statement on the rise of the largest altcoin Ethereum, suggested selling Ethereum (ETH) and buying Bitcoin (BTC). Claiming that Ethereum has entered a bear market compared to Bitcoin at this point, Schiff argued that Ethereum is nearing the top of its trading range and that it might be better to sell it now and use the money obtained to buy Bitcoin. While Schiff is not a fan of either cryptocurrency, he notes that he currently sees Bitcoin as the stronger option. ‚ÄúEthereum has reached the upper end of its trading range again. If you''re holding now, it''s a good time to sell. As painful as it is to say, selling Ethereum and using the proceeds to buy Bitcoin is a better strategy than continuing to hold Ethereum. Ethereum''s Bullish Bearish Recovery! The famous name stated that he would not personally choose to buy Bitcoin or Ethereum, but he stated that Ethereum is in a bear market compared to Bitcoin. ‚ÄúETH''s recent rise is merely a recovery within a bear market. If you feel compelled to hold cryptocurrency, selling Ethereum and buying Bitcoin would be a more sensible choice.‚Äù Peter Schiff recently stated that Ethereum faces competition and a growing number of competitors in terms of its use cases. The expert argued that Ethereum offers more alternatives in terms of platform utility compared to Bitcoin. Ether is back near the upper end of its trading range again. If you own any, this is a great time to sell. As much as it pains me to say, selling Ether and buying Bitcoin with the proceeds is a better trade than holding Ether. ‚Äî Peter Schiff (@PeterSchiff) July 21, 2025 *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Unexpected Endorsement from Bitcoin (BTC) Enemy Peter Schiff! "Sell This Altcoin, Buy Bitcoin!"

HEADLINE: Coinbase Launches CFTC-Regulated Perpetual Futures for US Retail Traders
SUMMARY: Coinbase has launched CFTC-regulated perpetual futures for US retail traders, providing an onshore alternative to offshore derivatives giants. Key Takeaways: Coinbase has launched CFTC-regulated nano BTC and ETH perpetual futures. The new products offer up to 10x leverage for US retail traders. Coinbase plans to expand its product lineup, targeting more cryptocurrencies. The launch introduces nano Bitcoin (BTC-PERP) and nano Ether (ETH-PERP) contracts through Coinbase Financial Markets, allowing leverage of up to 10x with taker fees starting at 0.02%, the exchange said in a Monday announcement . Perpetual contracts, derivatives with no expiry date, have traditionally made up the lion‚Äôs share of global crypto derivatives volume. US Traders Exit Shadows as Regulated Futures Arrive U.S. traders were long sidelined by regulatory barriers, pushing many toward unregulated offshore platforms, often at the expense of transparency and legal risk. Coinbase‚Äôs move changes that narrative, bringing these instruments within a federally regulated framework overseen by the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC). The contracts are structured to mimic traditional perpetuals while maintaining regulatory compliance, with five-year expirations and hourly funding rates to balance long and short positions. Settlements are conducted in USD, and trading is available 24/7, an industry standard in crypto that aligns with the global nature of digital assets. Coinbase‚Äôs rollout comes amid a broader push by U.S.-based exchanges to reclaim market share from overseas rivals. The firm recently acquired Deribit for $2.9 billion, positioning itself as a serious player in crypto derivatives. Kraken has also quietly launched its own CFTC-compliant perps via Kraken Pro, reflecting renewed domestic interest in regulated access to leverage products. Beyond BTC and ETH, Coinbase hinted at future listings tied to other major cryptocurrencies, including Solana and XRP, as it builds out a more comprehensive offering. The wait is over ‚Äì Perpetual futures have arrived in the U.S. ‚Üí No monthly expirations ‚Üí Trade with up to 10x leverage ‚Üí Fees as low as 0.02% Now you can trade perpetual-style futures on Coinbase Financial Markets, a secure and CFTC-regulated platform. pic.twitter.com/627ZOPTTzG ‚Äî Coinbase Futures (@cbFutures) July 21, 2025 The company also offers 20x leverage for precious metals like silver and gold, appealing to traders seeking broader exposure across asset classes. ‚ÄúU.S. traders can now access enhanced capital efficiency and amplify their market positions within a secure, regulated framework,‚Äù the exchange said. Coinbase Named TIME ‚ÄòDisruptor‚Äô As reported, TIME has recognized Coinbase as one of 2025‚Äôs 100 Most Influential Companies , labeling the crypto exchange a ‚Äúdisruptor‚Äù for its significant role in shaping US digital asset policies and markets. The accolade highlights Coinbase‚Äôs aggressive advocacy in Washington and its expanding influence in the crypto sector. Coinbase‚Äôs stock has surged 42% year-to-date, climbing from around $303 to a high near $382. The rise comes amid the passage of the GENIUS stablecoin bill and Coinbase‚Äôs historic inclusion in the S&P 500 in May . TIME noted the exchange as a key driver behind the industry‚Äôs policy efforts and predicted Coinbase could become the central hub for crypto trading in the US. Beyond the US, Coinbase is broadening its reach in Europe, securing a license under the EU‚Äôs MiCA regulatory framework through Luxembourg‚Äôs financial regulator. The company plans to establish its European headquarters in Luxembourg. Additionally, Coinbase is seeking SEC approval to offer tokenized equities, which would position it as a competitor to popular retail trading platforms like Robinhood and WeBull. The post Coinbase Launches CFTC-Regulated Perpetual Futures for US Retail Traders appeared first on Cryptonews .

HEADLINE: Mercurity Fintech Claims $200M Solana Ventures Deal ‚Äì But Solana Says No Such Agreement Exists
SUMMARY: Nasdaq-listed Mercurity Fintech announced a $200 million Equity Line of Credit Agreement with Solana Ventures to launch a Solana-based treasury strategy, but Solana Ventures immediately denied any involvement. In an X post, Solana Venture stated it is ‚Äú not affiliated or involved with any equity line of credit agreements with any publicly listed companies. ‚Äú Solana Ventures is not affiliated or involved with any equity line of credit agreements with any publicly listed companies or entities. ‚Äî Solana Ventures (@SolanaVentures) July 21, 2025 Mercurity claimed the funding would support SOL accumulation, staking operations, validator nodes, and investments in Solana-based projects, including real-world assets and tokenized finance products. Solana Ventures or Another Company With The Same Name? Despite Solana Ventures‚Äô swift denial, Mercurity Fintech hasn‚Äôt taken down their posts or provided any clarity on it. However, according to WuBlockchain, the company stated in its press release is not the renowned Solana Ventures but another company that simply uses a similar name. Solana Ventures said it has not signed or participated in any equity credit line agreements with any public company or institution. The company in the press release simply uses a similar name. ‚Äî Wu Blockchain (@WuBlockchain) July 22, 2025 The incident comes as legitimate Solana treasury companies have driven significant market interest, with DeFi Development Corp. reaching 999,999 SOL holdings worth $181 million. The dispute occurs amid a broader corporate rush into Solana treasuries, with BIT Mining planning to raise $200-300 million for SOL accumulation and multiple companies pivoting from Bitcoin to alternative cryptocurrencies. Legitimate Solana Treasury Companies Drive Market Momentum DeFi Development Corp. has emerged as the leading Solana treasury company, purchasing 141,383 SOL between July 14 and 20 at an average price of $133.53 , for approximately $19 million. The Florida-based firm now holds 999,999 SOL and SOL equivalents, just one token short of its symbolic 1 million milestone. The company‚Äôs SOL-per-share ratio reached 0.0514, representing a 13% increase from the previous week as it targets 1 SPS by December 2028. DeFi Development has drawn only 0.4% of its $5 billion equity line of credit, raising $19.2 million with $5 million in proceeds remaining for future purchases. Similarly, BIT Mining announced plans to raise $200-300 million for Solana treasury conversion , marking a departure from its previous focus on mining Bitcoin, Litecoin, Dogecoin, and Ethereum Classic. The company‚Äôs stock surged over 300% in pre-market trading following the announcement of its pivot to the Solana ecosystem. Moreover, Canadian firm Sol Strategies holds over 420,000 SOL tokens and filed for a Nasdaq listing under ticker ‚ÄúSTKE‚Äù as part of U.S. expansion plans. The company secured a $500 million convertible note facility earmarked for acquiring and staking additional SOL tokens. NextGen Digital Platforms has also purchased $1 million worth of Bitcoin as its first crypto acquisition, with board approval for up to 80% treasury allocation to digital assets, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana. The diversified approach shows a trend where corporate acceptance of multiple cryptocurrency treasuries is increasing. However, it is worth noting that altcoins carry heightened risks due to volatility, lower liquidity, and experimental technology compared to Bitcoin. Altcoin Treasury Trend Expands Beyond Bitcoin Strategy Animoca Brands‚Äô Research reports that public companies are increasingly adding altcoins , such as Ethereum, Solana, and XRP, to their treasury strategies, following MicroStrategy‚Äôs Bitcoin model. Public companies are increasingly adding altcoins like Ether (ETH), Solana‚Äôs SOL, and XRP to their treasury strategies. #XRP #ETH https://t.co/P1ZjeIXlUu ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) July 18, 2025 Companies utilize convertible debt and equity issuance to build exposure without direct spot market purchases. For instance, SharpLink Gaming increased its Ethereum holdings by purchasing 32,892 ETH , worth approximately $115 million, bringing the total accumulation to 144,501 ETH, valued at $515 million, over nine days. The company became the world‚Äôs largest corporate holder of Ethereum, with 353,000 ETH worth over $1.2 billion. In the past few weeks, corporate altcoin announcements have triggered average stock price jumps of 150% in one day, 185% in a week, and 226% over a month. Following this adoption trend, Solana‚Äôs market capitalization surged past $100 billion for the first time since January 2025, following a 6.7% jump that brought prices to $192.94. Source: CoinMarketCap The milestone positions Solana as the sixth-largest cryptocurrency, just $9 billion behind Binance Coin. Adding to the growing momentum, Solana decentralized exchanges processed over $1 trillion in cumulative volume during the first half of 2025, exceeding the volume of the pre
