HEADLINE: Bit Origin Buys 40.5M Dogecoin in First Crypto Treasury Move
SUMMARY: China-based pork processor turned Bitcoin miner Bit Origin has officially launched its crypto treasury strategy by purchasing 40.5 million Dogecoin, marking a significant pivot in its evolving business direction. The company announced the acquisition on Monday, describing it as its ‚Äúfirst strategic acquisition‚Äù under its digital asset treasury initiative, funded through a share sale and debt offering aiming to raise $500 million. At an average purchase price of $0.24 per Dogecoin, Bit Origin spent nearly $9.9 million on the buy, with the top memecoin now trading at $0.26, according to CoinMarketCap. The move comes amid Bit Origin‚Äôs efforts to expand its presence in the crypto ecosystem beyond mining infrastructure, aiming to directly engage with the value and utility of digital assets. From Pork to Crypto Bit Origin, initially launched in 2019 as China Xiangtai Food, was previously focused on pork processing, including slaughtering, packing, and wholesale distribution. In December 2021, the company shifted direction by acquiring 742 spot first-tier Bitcoin miners, eventually rebranding as Bit Origin in 2022 to reflect its crypto focus. In 2022, Bit Origin joined hands with MineOne Partners Limited to operate a mining facility in Cheyenne, Wyoming, providing operational and strategic support. However, in 2024, the China-linked mining firm was forced to vacate the property after an order from the White House due to its proximity to a nuclear missile base. Bit Origin‚Äôs CEO, Jinghai Jiang, who joined in 2021, previously served as a director at MineOne Partners, deepening the operational ties between the firms. Now, in 2025, Bit Origin‚Äôs company profile no longer references pork processing, reflecting its full commitment to the crypto sector. The Strategic Role of Dogecoin Dogecoin, created in 2013 as a lighthearted payment system by software engineers Billy Markus and Jackson Palmer, has evolved to become the eighth-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization. Bit Origin‚Äôs CEO Jiang stated that the decision to adopt Dogecoin for its treasury was due to the token nearing an ‚Äúinflection point‚Äù for micropayments. This is driven by renewed developer interest and broader institutional momentum toward tokenization . ‚ÄúWhile we embrace Dogecoin‚Äôs cultural origins, which have driven liquidity and familiarity, we believe the current market environment aligns with meme coin‚Äôs evolution toward decentralized finance,‚Äù Jiang said. Bit Origin recently entered agreements to sell up to $400 million in shares and $100 million in convertible debt to fund its Dogecoin treasury initiative . This move also positions Bit Origin within a shifting crypto landscape where major memecoin holders include wallets linked to Robinhood and Binance. The post Bit Origin Buys 40.5M Dogecoin in First Crypto Treasury Move appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

China-based pork processor turned Bitcoin miner Bit Origin has officially launched its crypto treasury strategy by purchasing 40.5 million Dogecoin, marking a significant pivot in its evolving business direction. The company announced the acquisition on Monday, describing it as its ‚Äúfirst strategic acquisition‚Äù under its digital asset treasury initiative, funded through a share sale and debt offering aiming to raise $500 million. At an average purchase price of $0.24 per Dogecoin, Bit Origin spent nearly $9.9 million on the buy, with the top memecoin now trading at $0.26, according to CoinMarketCap. The move comes amid Bit Origin‚Äôs efforts to expand its presence in the crypto ecosystem beyond mining infrastructure, aiming to directly engage with the value and utility of digital assets. From Pork to Crypto Bit Origin, initially launched in 2019 as China Xiangtai Food, was previously focused on pork processing, including slaughtering, packing, and wholesale distribution. In December 2021, the company shifted direction by acquiring 742 spot first-tier Bitcoin miners, eventually rebranding as Bit Origin in 2022 to reflect its crypto focus. In 2022, Bit Origin joined hands with MineOne Partners Limited to operate a mining facility in Cheyenne, Wyoming, providing operational and strategic support. However, in 2024, the China-linked mining firm was forced to vacate the property after an order from the White House due to its proximity to a nuclear missile base. Bit Origin‚Äôs CEO, Jinghai Jiang, who joined in 2021, previously served as a director at MineOne Partners, deepening the operational ties between the firms. Now, in 2025, Bit Origin‚Äôs company profile no longer references pork processing, reflecting its full commitment to the crypto sector. The Strategic Role of Dogecoin Dogecoin, created in 2013 as a lighthearted payment system by software engineers Billy Markus and Jackson Palmer, has evolved to become the eighth-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization. Bit Origin‚Äôs CEO Jiang stated that the decision to adopt Dogecoin for its treasury was due to the token nearing an ‚Äúinflection point‚Äù for micropayments. This is driven by renewed developer interest and broader institutional momentum toward tokenization . ‚ÄúWhile we embrace Dogecoin‚Äôs cultural origins, which have driven liquidity and familiarity, we believe the current market environment aligns with meme coin‚Äôs evolution toward decentralized finance,‚Äù Jiang said. Bit Origin recently entered agreements to sell up to $400 million in shares and $100 million in convertible debt to fund its Dogecoin treasury initiative . This move also positions Bit Origin within a shifting crypto landscape where major memecoin holders include wallets linked to Robinhood and Binance. The post Bit Origin Buys 40.5M Dogecoin in First Crypto Treasury Move appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

HEADLINE: Ethereum Price Prediction ‚Äì $4,096 Breakout or Pullback to $3,525?
SUMMARY: The post Ethereum Price Prediction ‚Äì $4,096 Breakout or Pullback to $3,525? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ethereum has seen an explosive price rally over the past week, gaining over 22% to touch a high near $3,856. However, the recent 24-hour dip of 4.18% has raised questions about short-term momentum. While there are jitters, spurred by regulatory uncertainty and ETF outflows, Ethereum‚Äôs fundamentals and onchain data suggest this could be a healthy cooldown rather than a trend reversal. Curious about ETH‚Äôs next milestone? Read this short-term ETH price analysis for targets. Strategic Holding Amid Sell Pressure According to Glassnode‚Äôs Cost Basis Distribution Heatmap, a large cohort of ETH investors who accumulated around the $2,520 level have begun booking profits. This is evidenced by the fading red bands from early July. Despite this, nearly 2 million ETH from this group remains unmoved. The platform reveals three critical insights: Holders are locking in partial gains, not exiting entirely. The remaining position shows continued belief in further upside. New buyers are absorbing the selling pressure, suggesting growing demand. This distribution behavior underlines a maturing investor base using rallies to rebalance, while also trusting ETH‚Äôs medium-term outlook. Ethereum Price Analysis Ethereum price is currently changing hands at $3,635, with a -4.18% pullback in the last 24 hours. The RSI has dipped from the overbought zone of 70 to 51, indicating waning momentum. The price has also broken below the 20-period EMA on the 4-hour chart, a sign of short-term bearish pressure. Key support is seen at $3,550, a potential bounce zone. A failure here may expose ETH to further downside toward the $3,525 level. On the upside, the Ethereum price needs to reclaim the resistance at $3,870 for any hopes of retesting the $4,096 mark. FAQs Why is Ethereum price down today? Bitcoin ETF outflows, profit-taking after a sharp ETH rally, and regulatory uncertainty have led to the ETH price going down today. Is Ethereum still bullish in the medium term? Yes, onchain data shows large holders retaining positions, suggesting confidence in long-term upside despite near-term corrections. Where is the ETH price heading next? While the support for ETH is at $3,550 and $3,525, the resistance is at $3,870 and the critical breakout level is at $4,096.

HEADLINE: Trump Media Announces Bitcoin Treasury Holdings Reached $2 Billion ‚Äì Details
SUMMARY: US President Donald Trump‚Äôs social media company, Trump Media, has revealed its multi-billion Bitcoin (BTC) holdings as part of its crypto treasury strategy. The news follows the President‚Äôs recent post praising the flagship cryptocurrency. Trump Media Continues Bitcoin Treasury Strategy On Monday, Trump Media and Technology Group (TMTG) announced that the company has accumulated approximately $2 billion worth of Bitcoin and BTC-related securities for its BTC treasury strategy. The company, which operates the social media platform Truth Social, the streaming platform Truth+, and the FinTech brand Truth.Fi, revealed that its Bitcoin Treasury holdings account for two-thirds of its nearly $3 billion in liquid assets. Trump Media stated that it has also allocated around $300 million for purchasing options tied to BTC-related securities, but did not offer a breakdown of the $2 billion holdings. Additionally, it shared its plans to continue buying Bitcoin and BTC-related assets, and convert its options into spot Bitcoin, depending on market conditions, to ‚Äúgenerate revenues and potentially acquire additional crypto assets.‚Äù Trump Media‚Äôs CEO and President Devin Nunes said, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre rigorously implementing our publicly announced strategy and fulfilling our bitcoin treasury plan.‚Äù He reaffirmed that the company‚Äôs strategy helps ensure its financial freedom and protect it ‚Äúagainst discrimination by financial institutions and will create synergies with the utility token we‚Äôre planning to introduce across the Truth Social ecosphere.‚Äù In May, Trump Media announced its plan to invest in the flagship crypto as part of its BTC strategy. As reported by Bitcoinist, the company secured commitments from approximately 50 investors to raise $2.5 billion with the sale of common stock and convertible notes. At the time, Nunes described the BTC investment as a pivotal step in defending the company, affirming, ‚ÄúWe view Bitcoin as an apex instrument of financial freedom, and now Trump Media will hold cryptocurrency as a crucial part of our assets.‚Äù US Continues Crypto Regulation Trump Media announcement follows President Trump‚Äôs recent Truth Social post praising the flagship crypto to conclude the historic ‚ÄúCrypto Week,‚Äù which saw the highly anticipated GENIUS Act being signed into law on Friday. On Sunday, the US president shared Coin‚ÄØCenter research director Peter‚ÄØVan‚ÄØValkenburgh‚Äôs 2018 testimony during a Senate Banking Committee hearing, calling it the ‚Äúgreatest Bitcoin explanation of all time.‚Äù Van‚ÄØValkenburgh argued that BTC and Blockchain technology are transforming global finance as ‚Äúthe world‚Äôs first public digital payments infrastructure.‚Äù During the 2018 hearing, he explained that: Bitcoin‚Äôs not the best money on every margin. It‚Äôs not yet accepted everywhere. It‚Äôs not used often to quote prices, and it‚Äôs not always a stable store of value. But it is working, and the mere fact that it works without trusted intermediaries is amazing. It‚Äôs a computer science breakthrough, and it will be as significant for freedom, prosperity, and human flourishing as the birth of the internet. Moreover, the White House is set to release its first crypto policy report on Tuesday, which is expected to include an official inventory of the US federal BTC holdings. For context, President Trump signed an executive order on January 23 mandating that the Digital Assets Working Group submit a report within 180 days of the order‚Äôs date. The report is expected to outline the Working Group‚Äôs regulatory and legislative recommendations and proposals to advance the executive order‚Äôs policies, as well as its evaluation of the follow-up order to establish a national digital asset stockpile.

HEADLINE: Bitcoin miner Mawson ousts CEO amid fraud allegations
SUMMARY: Nasdaq-listed Bitcoin miner Mawson Infrastructure Group Inc. has reportedly dismissed its CEO, Rahul Mewawalla, amid allegations of fraud and breach of fiduciary duty. The lawsuit was initiated in the Delaware Court of Chancery, and the allegations range from suspected fraudulent activities to misconduct. Mewawalla denies wrongdoing, points to earlier achievements The dismissal of Rahul Mewawalla comes as a surprise to many as it is happening months after Mawson awarded him $2.5 million in cash bonuses, 1.2 million restricted stock units, and a base salary increase to $1.2 million, a reward for what it called ‚Äúhigh-performing‚Äù executive performance. On May 30, the company notified Mewawalla that his termination for ‚ÄúCause,‚Äù as defined in his employment agreement, was under consideration and days down the line, the board put him on administrative leave, tapping General Counsel Kaliste Saloom to be interim CEO. By July 8, the decision had been made; his board seat was revoked and the lawsuit, which accused him of fraud and fiduciary breaches, was filed in Delaware‚Äôs Court of Chancery seeking to recover damages. Mewawalla is yet to comment on or respond to Mawson‚Äôs accusations. However, in a July 17 letter to the board, he ‚Äúrespectfully and vigorously‚Äù disagreed with the company‚Äôs version of events while highlighting the board‚Äôs own public praise of his leadership earlier this year. He mentioned how in recent public filings, the company highlighted ‚Äúnumerous strategic, operational, and financial milestones achieved‚Äù while he was CEO, including 36% revenue growth, a 35% jump in gross profit, and reductions in SG&A expenses. Mawson made headlines for being sued months ago The dispute between Mawson and its CEO is happening months after the company got sued by NYDIG‚Äôs parent company, Stone Ridge and its mining subsidiary, Consensus Colocation, accusing it of allegedly illegally obtaining over 20,000 ASIC miners valued at $30 million and using them to mine Bitcoin for itself since February 28, 2025. Consensus and Mawson had a colocation agreement established in December 2023, with plans to terminate by March 2025. However, there were disputes over colocation fees and access to miners . Mawson issued invoices totaling $1,978,000 for colocation fees and electricity, which Stone Ridge disputed, claiming there was a mutual agreement that there would be less energy used during the final month of the contract. Mawson went as far as changing the payout address for the miners and revoking access for Consensus personnel, an action it justified by citing a provision in their agreement that Stone Ridge argues does not apply. The company filed the lawsuit to seek an injunction that would restore the hosting agreement and has demanded that Mawson reinstate access to the miners as part of the removal process. There have been no updates since then but the case has been filed with more updates expected in the future. KEY Difference Wire helps crypto brands break through and dominate headlines fast

HEADLINE: Why Crypto Market Is Down Today? Bitcoin Price Drops To $117K
SUMMARY: The post Why Crypto Market Is Down Today? Bitcoin Price Drops To $117K appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The crypto market took a sharp hit today , with most major tokens posting heavy losses. Bitcoin fell below $117,000, Ethereum plunged by 25.17% to $3,650, and other altcoins like Solana and XRP followed the same trend. The sell-off came after a surprise $130 million outflow from Bitcoin ETFs , breaking a 12-day streak of steady inflows. With prices hitting recent highs, some traders also locked in profits, adding to the pressure. Another factor weighing on sentiment is the upcoming speech by Fed Chair Jerome Powell , which could influence the outlook on interest rates. Many investors are holding back until they hear what Powell has to say. Not Overheated Yet: Market Still Has Room to Breathe While prices are falling, things aren‚Äôt looking disastrous. According to on-chain data, the market isn‚Äôt in panic mode. CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr notes that Bitcoin is still trading within what he calls the ‚Äúgrowth zone.‚Äù This is the range between the Investor Price Median at $92,000 and the Hype Alert Threshold at $139,000. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre not in the danger zone of excessive speculation,‚Äù Adler said on X. In simpler terms, this means people are still holding or gradually buying, not chasing wild gains or panic selling. That‚Äôs usually a good sign for market stability. The Advanced Sentiment Index is sitting at around 64%, which shows a positive outlook, but not overconfidence. If Bitcoin can stay above the $92,000 mark, it‚Äôs likely to keep support from long-term holders. Still, given the current sentiment and on-chain strength, there‚Äôs room for Bitcoin to climb gradually, as long as things don‚Äôt get too overheated. HEADLINE: Interest in Ethereum Grows in Traditional Finance! Ethereum ETF Sees Highest Weekly Inflow in History! Here Are the Details
SUMMARY: The traditional financial world is witnessing record-breaking interest in Ethereum. Ethereum spot ETFs attracted approximately $2.18 billion in investment over the past week, with net inflows of 677,000 ETH. This represents the highest weekly inflow in Ethereum ETF history. Ethereum Spot ETFs Break Record: Weekly Inflows $2.18 Billion, ETHA Tops Volume Thanks to these massive inflows, the total on-chain holdings of Ethereum ETFs, measured by known on-chain addresses, reached an all-time high of 5.15 million ETH. During the same period, trading volume for Ethereum ETFs also exploded. Total weekly volume reached $10.5 billion, representing an average daily trading volume of $2.1 billion. Nearly 70% of this volume, and over 80% of all net inflows, occurred through the iShares Ethereum Trust ETF (ETHA). Driven by the sharp rise in ETH prices, the asset value of spot Ethereum ETFs under management reached over $15.5 billion, setting a new record. ETH surged 27% in the past week and 52% in July. Institutional Ethereum Purchases Support Rally The ETH rally is driven not only by ETF demand but also by institutional treasury purchases. Sharplink Gaming (SBET) stands out in particular. Over the past nine days, the company has aggressively purchased ETH, reaching 280,706 (~$840 million), surpassing the Ethereum Foundation to become the largest institutional holder of ETH. SBET financed these acquisitions with a $1 billion stock issuance program announced in May. On July 17, the company applied to increase this program to $6 billion and announced that these funds would be used to purchase new ETH. Shareholders will evaluate this plan in a vote on July 24. Other Companies Are Also Building ETH Treasuries Apart from SBET, BitMine Immersion (BMNR) and Bit Digital (BTBT) are also implementing similar strategies. BMNR raised $250 million in funding at the end of June and held a position of 163,000 ETH. BTBT announced that it has received over 100,000 ETH following a $172 million funding round and Bitcoin sale. This strong institutional demand for Ethereum ETFs isn''t just about price appreciation; it''s also further solidifying ETH''s place in the financial system. With ETF records, institutional ETH treasuries, and increasing investment volume, Ethereum is solidifying its position as a store of value and high-yield asset in the eyes of investors. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Interest in Ethereum Grows in Traditional Finance! Ethereum ETF Sees Highest Weekly Inflow in History! Here Are the Details

HEADLINE: Unveiling the Power: MicroStrategy Bitcoin Strategy Poised for 900K BTC by 2027
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Unveiling the Power: MicroStrategy Bitcoin Strategy Poised for 900K BTC by 2027 In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, few companies spark as much debate and fascination as MicroStrategy, especially concerning its aggressive Bitcoin acquisition strategy. While some critics label its valuation as a ‚Äòbubble,‚Äô a leading U.S. investment bank, TD Cowen, has stepped forward to robustly defend the company‚Äôs approach. They argue that valuing MicroStrategy solely on its Bitcoin holdings is a flawed perspective. This article delves into why TD Cowen maintains its bullish stance, projecting a staggering 900,000 BTC for MicroStrategy by 2027. If you‚Äôve ever wondered about the true drivers behind MicroStrategy‚Äôs market premium and its ambitious future, you‚Äôre in the right place to understand the nuances of the MicroStrategy Bitcoin narrative. Why is MicroStrategy Bitcoin Strategy Drawing Such Intense Attention? MicroStrategy has become synonymous with corporate Bitcoin adoption, holding a significant portion of the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency on its balance sheet. This unique strategy has naturally led to scrutiny, with many questioning whether its market capitalization, which often trades at a substantial premium to its underlying Bitcoin assets, is truly justified. Currently, MicroStrategy‚Äôs market cap stands at an impressive $124.3 billion, reflecting a 72.6% premium over its $72 billion in Bitcoin holdings. TD Cowen‚Äôs defense cuts through the noise, asserting that this premium is not only warranted but is a testament to MicroStrategy‚Äôs strategic brilliance. They emphasize that the argument of pricing the company solely by its Bitcoin holdings overlooks critical factors that contribute to its value. Here‚Äôs why TD Cowen believes the MicroStrategy Bitcoin premium is valid: Ability to Raise Cheap Capital: MicroStrategy has demonstrated an unparalleled knack for raising substantial capital through various means, such as convertible notes and equity offerings. This capital is then strategically deployed to acquire more Bitcoin. Unlike traditional companies that raise capital for operational expenses or expansion into new markets, MicroStrategy primarily uses it to accumulate a rapidly appreciating digital asset. Growth in Bitcoin Per Share: A key metric highlighted by TD Cowen is MicroStrategy‚Äôs ability to consistently grow its Bitcoin per share. This means that existing shareholders benefit from the company‚Äôs capital-raising activities, as the newly acquired Bitcoin increases the overall BTC exposure for each share owned. Pioneering Institutional Adoption: MicroStrategy isn‚Äôt just buying Bitcoin; it‚Äôs actively shaping the narrative around institutional digital asset adoption. Its bold moves provide a blueprint and confidence for other corporations considering similar strategies. These factors, according to TD Cowen, transform MicroStrategy from a mere Bitcoin proxy into a sophisticated financial entity with a unique capital allocation strategy centered around Bitcoin. Decoding the MicroStrategy Bitcoin Premium: More Than Just HODLing? The concept of a premium might seem perplexing at first glance. If a company holds $100 worth of an asset, why would its market value be $170? For MicroStrategy Bitcoin , this premium reflects investor confidence in its management‚Äôs ability to execute its unique strategy and continue accumulating Bitcoin efficiently. It‚Äôs a testament to the market‚Äôs belief that MicroStrategy can generate more value than simply holding Bitcoin directly. Let‚Äôs look at a concrete example: MicroStrategy recently raised a significant $740 million. This capital wasn‚Äôt used for traditional business operations; instead, it was strategically deployed to add over 6,200 Bitcoins to its already substantial holdings. What‚Äôs even more impressive is the impact this had on the company‚Äôs Bitcoin per share metric, which saw a remarkable 20.8% increase this year. This growth indicates that MicroStrategy is effectively leveraging its capital structure to enhance shareholder exposure to Bitcoin. To further illustrate MicroStrategy‚Äôs unique financial engineering, consider the following breakdown: Metric Value Significance in MicroStrategy Bitcoin Strategy Current Market Capitalization $124.3 Billion Reflects investor belief in future growth and strategic value beyond just BTC holdings. Value of Bitcoin Holdings $72 Billion The foundational asset base that drives much of the company‚Äôs valuation. Market Premium 72.6% Justified by the company‚Äôs unique ability to raise capital and grow BTC per share. Recent Capital Raised $740 Million Demonstrates strong access to capital markets for Bitcoin acquisition. Bitcoins Added (Recently) Over 6,200 BTC Direct result of successful capital raises, increasing overall holdings. BTC Per Share Growth (YTD) 20.8% A key indicator of increasing shareholder value through Bitcoin accumulation. This table underscores that MicroStrategy‚Äôs strategy is far more complex than a simple ‚Äòbuy

HEADLINE: Bitcoin (BTC) Breakout Alert: Stay Patient for the Big Surge!
SUMMARY: Bitcoin (BTC) has been hovering above and below $118,000 for more than a week now. The price is also traversing inside a triangle, and is coming near to a breakout point. Could there be a surge to $130,000 and beyond, or are we in for a dip, followed by more sideways choppiness? Triangle breakout imminent Source: TradingView The latest series of sideways movement after the last surge up from $112,000 possibly won‚Äôt last as long as previous consolidation periods. This is because this continuation pattern is a much smaller triangle. Of course, the $BTC price could exit the triangle and then still keep trending sideways, perhaps printing a different, and bigger chart pattern. That said, it does rather look as though a breakout is about to take place. It‚Äôs customary for Bitcoin to hardly ever get to the ends of triangles, and it''s much more usual for a breakout to occur not more than around three quarters of the way through the pattern. The price is at this point now, so it just may be a matter of time before the bulls ignite the thrusters and the rocket ship takes off again. The $119,000 resistance is the first target, then a higher high above $119,640, and finally a take out of the $121,000 high before the final ascent to the all-time high at $123,200. If however the bears are able to take control, just under $116,000 would be the last line in the sand before a potential rapid collapse to $112,000. Going below $109,000 would be cause for major concern. Strong support structure below Source: TradingView The weekly chart shows that if the price can get above $119,000 we could be back to smooth sailing and another leg higher, perhaps to $130,000. If on the other hand the price does fall back down, decent price structure, formed by the tops of the falling wedge and the bull flag, would probably act as strong support, and a bounce would be likely to occur from there. RSI trend break on 2-week chart Source: TradingView It‚Äôs the 2-week chart that holds a big clue as to where the $BTC price is going next. At the bottom of the chart is the Relative Strength Index (RSI), which signals overbought and oversold conditions. It can be seen in the chart that the indicator has just popped its head above the downtrend line. There is still the best part of two weeks before this can be confirmed, but a surge up to $130,000 would likely push the indicator line well beyond the downtrend. This would be the first stage in the process of attempting to nullify bearish divergence. There is still a long way to go for the indicator to reach the previous high of 87.6. If the indicator line fails to get there, this strong bearish divergence would likely be the major factor for the commencement of the next bear market. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

HEADLINE: SpaceX just moved over $150 million in Bitcoin
SUMMARY: After more than three years of inactivity in the crypto market, SpaceX broke the silence with a monster move on July 22. According to blockchain analytics platform Arkham Intelligence , a wallet owned by Elon Musk‚Äôs company moved 1,308 Bitcoin ( BTC ), worth around $153 million, from Coinbase to a fresh address. The motivation behind the transfer is still unclear, and no further moves have been spotted, although it is clear there was no change in SpaceX‚Äôs net holdings. As reported by Arkham , the aerospace giant still holds 6,977 BTC, valued at approximately $815 million. SpaceX BTC moves. Source: Arkham What are Elon Musk‚Äôs Bitcoin plans? With the receiving address still inactive, it appears the move could merely indicate a routine wallet reshuffle. However, given Musk‚Äôs influence on the market, some speculate the transfer might result in major price movements. The speculations are justified as the transaction makes it clear that SpaceX held a significant Bitcoin position for quite some time, choosing not to liquidate despite market volatility. This, in turn, implies the company might be pursuing a long-term investment strategy, treating BTC as a strategic reserve asset. The timing of the transfer is also significant, as institutional interest in the ‚Äúdigital gold‚Äù as a hedge has never been higher, driven by pro-crypto policy shifts. Moreover, Elon Musk recently announced the formation of a new political party, the ‚ÄúAmerica Party,‚Äù aiming to disrupt the U.S. two-party system. Musk, who previously maintained a close relationship with President Trump, said in a post on X that the party would support Bitcoin as ‚Äúfiat is pointless.‚Äù Musk‚Äôs take on fiat and Bitcoin. Source: X This statement now seems to have gained a whole dimension in light of the data provided by Arkham . Featured image via Shutterstock The post SpaceX just moved over $150 million in Bitcoin appeared first on Finbold .

HEADLINE: Here Are Top 20 Public Companies By Bitcoin Holdings
SUMMARY: Amid the surging interest in Bitcoin among institutional players, this article highlights the top 20 largest BTC holders. Institutional interest in Bitcoin has continued to skyrocket over the years. Major corporate entities, including publicly traded firms like MicroStrategy, currently hold substantial amounts of BTC in their reserves.¬†These companies are spread across various industries globally, with U.S. firms dominating the list.¬†MicroStrategy Leads Mara, Riot, and Trump Media Company¬†Notably, MicroStrategy, which has been renamed to Strategy, holds the first position with 607,770 Bitcoin. The company began buying Bitcoin on August 11, 2020. Notably, Strategy acquired the BTC at an average cost of $71,777, bringing the total to $43.62 billion.¬†Meanwhile, the company''s Bitcoin stash is currently worth $71.76 billion, representing an ROI of 65%. Mara Holdings , Inc., XXI, and Riot Platforms rank as the second, third, and fourth largest public holders of Bitcoin. While Mara currently holds 50,000 BTC ($5.87 billion), XXI and Riot Platforms hold stashes of 37,230 BTC ($4.37 billion) and 19,225 BTC ($2.26 billion), respectively.¬†Notably, Donald Trump Media & Technology Group‚Äôs (TMTG) holding of 18,430 BTC makes it the fifth-largest public holder of Bitcoin. Following the surge in Bitcoin‚Äôs price, TMTG‚Äôs Bitcoin holding is currently valued at $2.16 billion.¬†Middle Place¬†Meanwhile, Japan-based Metaplanet and U.S.-headquartered Galaxy Digital Holdings rank as the sixth and seventh-largest public holders of Bitcoin. They hold 16,352 BTC and 12,830 Bitcoins, valued at $1.92 billion and $1.5 billion, respectively.¬†CleanSpark, Tesla, and Hut 8 Mining are ranked in eighth, ninth, and tenth place in the publicly traded Bitcoin treasury companies leaderboard. According to the data, while CleanSpark owns 12,608 BTC ($1.48 billion), Tesla and Hut 8 hold around 11,509 BTC ($1.35 billion) and 10,273 BTC ($1.2 billion), respectively.¬†In the 11th and 12th places are Coinbase and Block Inc., which hold 9,267 BTC ($1.08 billion) and 8,584 BTC ($1 billion) in their treasuries, respectively.¬†The 13th, 14th, and 15th largest Bitcoin holders are Next Technology Holding, ProCap BTC, and Semler Scientific. Notably, these public entities have roughly 5,833 BTC, 4,932 BTC, and $4,846 BTC, valued at around $686 million, $580 million, and $570 million, respectively.¬†Rounding Out The Top 20¬†Furthermore, GameStop, which recently announced its venture into the Bitcoin market, ranks as the 16th-largest public holder of Bitcoin, with a holding of 4,710 BTC worth $554 million.¬†Cango Inc., Bitcoin Group, Boya Interactive International, and Microcloud Hologram dominate the bottom of the top 20 list. The data shows that they currently hold around 4,240 BTC, 3,605 BTC, 3,350 BTC, and 2,353 BTC, valued at $498 million, $424 million, $394 million, and $277 million, respectively. Top 20 largest public holders of Bitcoin The top 20 largest public holders of Bitcoin It is worth noting that the list only captures the top 20 publicly traded companies holding Bitcoin. According to BitcoinTreasuries, there are over 140 public holders of Bitcoin, with combined holdings of 887,301 BTC worth roughly $104.31 billion.

Following the surge in Bitcoin‚Äôs price, TMTG‚Äôs Bitcoin holding is currently valued at $2.16 billion.¬†Middle Place¬†Meanwhile, Japan-based Metaplanet and U.S.-headquartered Galaxy Digital Holdings rank as the sixth and seventh-largest public holders of Bitcoin. They hold 16,352 BTC and 12,830 Bitcoins, valued at $1.92 billion and $1.5 billion, respectively.¬†CleanSpark, Tesla, and Hut 8 Mining are ranked in eighth, ninth, and tenth place in the publicly traded Bitcoin treasury companies leaderboard. According to the data, while CleanSpark owns 12,608 BTC ($1.48 billion), Tesla and Hut 8 hold around 11,509 BTC ($1.35 billion) and 10,273 BTC ($1.2 billion), respectively.¬†In the 11th and 12th places are Coinbase and Block Inc., which hold 9,267 BTC ($1.08 billion) and 8,584 BTC ($1 billion) in their treasuries, respectively.¬†The 13th, 14th, and 15th largest Bitcoin holders are Next Technology Holding, ProCap BTC, and Semler Scientific. Notably, these public entities have roughly 5,833 BTC, 4,932 BTC, and $4,846 BTC, valued at around $686 million, $580 million, and $570 million, respectively.¬†Rounding Out The Top 20¬†Furthermore, GameStop, which recently announced its venture into the Bitcoin market, ranks as the 16th-largest public holder of Bitcoin, with a holding of 4,710 BTC worth $554 million.¬†Cango Inc., Bitcoin Group, Boya Interactive International, and Microcloud Hologram dominate the bottom of the top 20 list. The data shows that they currently hold around 4,240 BTC, 3,605 BTC, 3,350 BTC, and 2,353 BTC, valued at $498 million, $424 million, $394 million, and $277 million, respectively. Top 20 largest public holders of Bitcoin The top 20 largest public holders of Bitcoin It is worth noting that the list only captures the top 20 publicly traded companies holding Bitcoin. According to BitcoinTreasuries, there are over 140 public holders of Bitcoin, with combined holdings of 887,301 BTC worth roughly $104.31 billion.

HEADLINE: Solana Defies Market Drop, Touches $200 as Altcoins Retreat: Crypto Daybook Americas
SUMMARY: By Omkar Godbole (All times ET unless indicated otherwise) The past 24 hours have witnessed a rare dynamic: a major token moving on technology news rather than trading flows and general narratives of institutional adoption. Solana''s native sol (SOL) experienced a notable spike in price volatility, rising as high as $200 for the first time since March after Jito Labs, an infrastructure company, announced Block Assembly Marketplace (BAM) , designed to counter maximal extractable value strategies, such as front-running and sandwiching. SOL is now tussling with BNB for the No. 5 ranking among the world''s largest cryptocurrencies by market value. Bitcoin (BTC), meanwhile, is still trading directionless below $120,000, while ether (ETH) pulled back after printing an indecisive Doji candle on Monday. That left the CoinDesk 20 Index of the biggest tokens 2% lower over the past 24 hours. The CoinDesk 80 Index , which encompasses the next 80 largest cryptocurrencies, fell 3.5%, most likely reflecting profit-taking in altcoins after their run-up in the past few days. The pullback comes on the heels of consecutive weekly gains that look to have set the stage for a notable bull run. (Check out the TA section ). "Solana continues to lead altcoin performance, briefly surpassing $200, boosted by the Block Assembly Marketplace announcement, which introduced enhanced transaction speed and improved network efficiency," Valentin Fournier, lead research analyst at BRN, said in an email. "The broader market, however, failed to hold its momentum, reflecting increased uncertainty as ETF demand slows." While charts may point to further declines in the near future, the underlying market remains poised for growth, he said. "Short-term technicals may pressure prices further, but we remain constructive on the cycle overall," he noted, pointing to institutional and corporate demand as long-term bullish catalysts. Speaking of institutional adoption, JPMorgan is reportedly considering offering loans backed by customer-held crypto assets, such as BTC and ETH, possibly starting as early as next year. Mexico-listed real estate firm Grupo Murano is planning to adopt BTC as a core strategic asset, with an initial investment of $1 billion and a five-year goal to build a $10 billion reserve . In traditional markets, investors pulled money out of leveraged Strategy (MSTR) ETFs while bargain-hunting the 2x short ETF, a sign of reassessment of directional bets. The greenback was bid against major currencies, including the euro and the risk-sensitive Australian dollar. The Bank of Japan reportedly said it will provide U.S. dollar-denominated loans to domestic institutions against pooled collateral, a move aimed at addressing dollar funding stress. Stay alert! What to Watch Crypto July 23, 1 p.m.: Hedera (HBAR) mainnet upgrades to version 0.63. The process is expected to take about 40 minutes, during which network users may experience temporary disruptions. July 23-24: The Root Network (ROOT) mainnet will undergo a technical upgrade (v11.79.0) affecting NFT ownership data storage, requiring some 24 hours of downtime for NFT-related operations like minting, bridging, transferring and marketplace activity to support improved performance and scalability for large-scale collections. Macro July 22, 8:30 a.m.:¬†Fed Chair Jerome H. Powell delivers opening remarks at the Integrated Review of the Capital Framework for Large Banks Conference in Washington D.C. Livestream link . July 22, 1:00 p.m.:¬†Fed Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle W. Bowman speaks on innovation at the same conference. Livestream link . July 24, 8:15 a.m.: The European Central Bank will announce its interest rate decision, with President Christine Lagarde''s press conference following 30 minutes later. Livestream link . Main Refinancing Operations (MRO) rate Est. 1.9% vs. Prev. 2.15% July 24, 9:45 a.m.: S&P Global releases (Flash) July U.S. data on manufacturing and services activity. Composite PMI Prev. 52.9 Manufacturing PMI Est. 52.5 vs. Prev. 52.9 Services PMI Est. 53 vs. Prev. 52.9 Aug. 1, 12:01 a.m.: New U.S. tariffs take effect on imports from trading partners that failed to reach agreements by the July 9 deadline. These increased duties could range from 10% to as high as 70%, impacting a wide range of goods. Earnings (Estimates based on FactSet data) July 23: Tesla ( TSLA ), post-market, $0.42 July 29: PayPal Holdings ( PYPL ), pre-market, $1.29 July 30: Robinhood Markets ( HOOD ), post-market, $0.30 July 31: Coinbase Global ( COIN ), post-market, $1.35 July 31: Reddit ( RDDT ), post-market, $0.19 Aug. 5: Galaxy Digital ( GLXY ), pre-market Token Events Governance votes & calls Aavegotchi DAO is voting on a $245,000 funding proposal to expand Gotchi Battler into a revenue-generating game with PvE modes, NFTs and battle passes, aiming to reverse declining player numbers, boost GHST utility and create sustainable rewards. Voting ends July 22. Ethereum Name Service DAO is voting on

HEADLINE: Ethereum, Dogecoin, XRP Lead the Charge as Altcoin Season Heats Up
SUMMARY: The post Ethereum, Dogecoin, XRP Lead the Charge as Altcoin Season Heats Up appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The crypto market is signaling an early trend shift as capital flows out of Bitcoin and into altcoins. While Bitcoin has long been the dominant player, recent movements suggest that traders are now betting on alternative cryptocurrencies for stronger returns. Bitcoin Dominance Drops as Altcoins Outperform Crypto analyst Kyle Chass√© highlighted a notable drop in Bitcoin dominance‚Äîfrom 65% to 60% in just 30 days. This is one of the steepest declines in recent months, signaling a possible rotation toward altcoins. Altcoins have capitalized on this shift: Ethereum surged 26% Dogecoin jumped 40% XRP climbed 22% Cardano rose 23% These consistent gains are not just outperforming Bitcoin‚Äîthey‚Äôre reviving hopes of a new altcoin season. Altcoin Season Index Signals Momentum The Altcoin Season Index has jumped from 35 to 50 over the past month. While the official altseason threshold is 75, this sharp climb reflects increasing momentum in the altcoin market. Investors are growing more confident in altcoins‚Äô upside potential . Supporting this trend, the TOTAL3 market cap, which excludes both Bitcoin and Ethereum, has climbed nearly 33% month-over-month. At the same time, USDT dominance is falling, showing that traders are moving funds out of stablecoins and back into riskier assets. With Bitcoin‚Äôs price action stalling, the spotlight is now squarely on altcoins. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Crypto Crash: XRP, ETH and¬†XLM Pullback Despite Trump‚Äôs ‚ÄòStamp of Approval‚Äô For Crypto , Altseason Is Close, But Not Confirmed Not everyone is convinced. Investor Mourad Farouni compared the current market setup to the post-2016 election rally, noting that while things look bullish, a full confirmation of altseason hasn‚Äôt yet occurred. Meanwhile, analyst Micha√´l van de Poppe sees the recent dip as a healthy correction, not a bearish reversal. He believes that short-term volatility is expected during an early-stage altcoin bull cycle and encourages traders to stay focused on technicals rather than give in to panic. ‚ÄúSelling out of fear isn‚Äôt a strategy if your long-term thesis is intact,‚Äù he says. All indicators point to a market leaning heavily into altcoins. From price performance to volume shifts, the signals are stacking up. If momentum holds, the coming weeks could confirm the arrival of a full-blown altseason, with huge potential upside for early movers. .article_register_shortcode { padding: 18px 24px; border-radius: 8px; display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 6px 0 22px; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 0%, rgba(0, 82, 204, 0.1) 100%); } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { color: #000000; font-weight: 600; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 span { color: #0052CC; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-weight: 400; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; color: #171717B2; margin-top: 4px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body{ padding-right: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: right; } .article_register_shortcode .primary-button img{ vertical-align: middle; width: 20px; margin: 0; display: inline-block; } @media (min-width: 581px) and (max-width: 991px) { .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { margin-bottom: 0; } } @media (max-width: 580px) { .article_register_shortcode { display: block; padding: 20px; } .article_register_shortcode img { max-width: 50px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { font-size: 16px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body { margin-left: 0px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-size: 13px; line-height: 20px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: unset; } .article_register_shortcode .secondary-button { margin-bottom: 0; } } Never Miss a Beat in the Crypto World! HEADLINE: Why economist Peter Schiff is recommending selling Ethereum to buy Bitcoin
SUMMARY: American economist Peter Schiff is urging investors with exposure to cryptocurrencies to consider selling Ethereum ( ETH ) and reallocating funds into Bitcoin ( BTC ). It‚Äôs worth noting that Schiff has long been a critic of cryptocurrencies, particularly Bitcoin, arguing the asset has no intrinsic value and consistently advocating for gold instead. Schiff pointed out that Ethereum is trading near the top of its range, making it, in his view, an ideal time to sell. He believes the recent upswing is more likely a bear market rally than a sustained recovery, he said in an X post on July 21. ‚ÄúEther is back near the upper end of its trading range again. If you own any, this is a great time to sell. As much as it pains me to say, selling Ether and buying Bitcoin with the proceeds is a better trade than holding Ether,‚Äù the economist noted. His comments come at a time when Ethereum‚Äôs push toward the $4,000 mark has faltered, with the asset retreating amid profit-taking. At press time, ETH was trading at $3,685, down over 3% in the last 24 hours, though still up 23% in the past week. Bitcoin, by contrast, is consolidating around $119,060. ETH and BTC seven-day price chart. Source: Finbold Ethereum‚Äôs competition While Schiff remains skeptical of both Bitcoin and Ethereum as long-term investments , he views Ethereum as being at a relative disadvantage. According to him, the second-largest cryptocurrency by market cap faces stronger competition in its use-case narrative, whereas Bitcoin continues to dominate as the leading digital asset. As such, he argued that Ethereum is underperforming compared to Bitcoin, and may continue to do so. https://twitter.com/PeterSchiff/status/1947345315046068455 For investors insistent on holding crypto, Schiff sees a better risk-reward trade in rotating out of Ethereum and into Bitcoin, despite his broader reservations about the entire asset class. Beyond the Ethereum-Bitcoin debate, Schiff also renewed his criticism of political support for digital assets. The economist warned that efforts to promote domestic investment in crypto, particularly under President Donald Trump, could inadvertently accelerate the collapse of the U.S. dollar. In such a scenario, Schiff maintained, while Bitcoin holders might expect to benefit, gold would ultimately emerge as the real winner. His remarks come as the U.S. ramps up crypto regulation, including the newly signed Genius Act targeting stablecoins. Featured image via Peter Schiff YouTube The post Why economist Peter Schiff is recommending selling Ethereum to buy Bitcoin appeared first on Finbold .

HEADLINE: Can XRP Price Hit $100 in 2025?
SUMMARY: The post Can XRP Price Hit $100 in 2025? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The XRP community is excited again, and for good reason. With a growing list of bullish developments and rising mainstream adoption, many traders are now asking the big question: Can XRP actually reach $100 in 2025? While that might sound like an unrealistic prediction, one analyst took a closer look at what‚Äôs fueling this speculation and whether it‚Äôs really possible. What‚Äôs Driving the Hype? There‚Äôs no doubt that XRP has had a rocky journey over the past few years, especially with its ongoing legal battle with the SEC. But now, things are turning around. One of the biggest reasons people are getting bullish on XRP is the possible approval of an XRP ETF (Exchange-Traded Fund). If approved, it would allow institutional investors to buy into XRP more easily, just like they do with Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs. That could bring in billions of dollars in new money‚Äîand send prices soaring. In addition to the ETF, Ripple is allegedly planning to go public. Once Ripple becomes a publicly traded company, it could bring even more attention and legitimacy to XRP and its technology. But the biggest long-term catalyst could be bank adoption. If banks around the world start using XRP to move money, that could replace the outdated SWIFT system, which is slow and expensive. XRP transactions are fast, cheap, and energy-efficient. If trillions of dollars begin flowing through XRP every day, demand could skyrocket and so could the price. Search Interest Is Exploding One surprising data point is Google search volume. Interest in XRP is now reaching record highs. Even higher than in 2017 and 2021 bull markets. When this kind of retail interest spikes, it often leads to massive price movements. People are asking everywhere: ‚ÄúShould I buy XRP?‚Äù And that rising curiosity can fuel even more buying pressure. Short-Term Price Targets and Buy Zones Right now, XRP is showing a strong bullish trend. The analyst said that watching key levels like $3.30 and $3.16 as possible pullback zones before the next leg up. If Bitcoin pulls back slightly, it might give traders a chance to scoop up XRP before it pushes to $5. What Needs to Happen for $100 to Be Realistic? 100 is a huge number for XRP. For it to get there, a lot would have to happen: Massive global adoption by banks and financial institutions ETF approval and institutional inflows Ripple‚Äôs IPO bringing new credibility and exposure A multi-year bull market that drives the entire crypto market higher Trillions in daily volume flowing through XRP as a payment solution

While that might sound like an unrealistic prediction, one analyst took a closer look at what‚Äôs fueling this speculation and whether it‚Äôs really possible. What‚Äôs Driving the Hype? There‚Äôs no doubt that XRP has had a rocky journey over the past few years, especially with its ongoing legal battle with the SEC. But now, things are turning around. One of the biggest reasons people are getting bullish on XRP is the possible approval of an XRP ETF (Exchange-Traded Fund). If approved, it would allow institutional investors to buy into XRP more easily, just like they do with Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs. That could bring in billions of dollars in new money‚Äîand send prices soaring. In addition to the ETF, Ripple is allegedly planning to go public. Once Ripple becomes a publicly traded company, it could bring even more attention and legitimacy to XRP and its technology. But the biggest long-term catalyst could be bank adoption. If banks around the world start using XRP to move money, that could replace the outdated SWIFT system, which is slow and expensive. XRP transactions are fast, cheap, and energy-efficient. If trillions of dollars begin flowing through XRP every day, demand could skyrocket and so could the price. Search Interest Is Exploding One surprising data point is Google search volume. Interest in XRP is now reaching record highs. Even higher than in 2017 and 2021 bull markets. When this kind of retail interest spikes, it often leads to massive price movements. People are asking everywhere: ‚ÄúShould I buy XRP?‚Äù And that rising curiosity can fuel even more buying pressure. Short-Term Price Targets and Buy Zones Right now, XRP is showing a strong bullish trend. The analyst said that watching key levels like $3.30 and $3.16 as possible pullback zones before the next leg up. If Bitcoin pulls back slightly, it might give traders a chance to scoop up XRP before it pushes to $5. What Needs to Happen for $100 to Be Realistic? 100 is a huge number for XRP. For it to get there, a lot would have to happen: Massive global adoption by banks and financial institutions ETF approval and institutional inflows Ripple‚Äôs IPO bringing new credibility and exposure A multi-year bull market that drives the entire crypto market higher Trillions in daily volume flowing through XRP as a payment solution

HEADLINE: Eric Trump Mocks Critics Amid Ether Price Surge, What‚Äôs Next for Crypto?
SUMMARY: Eric Trump took to X on Monday to celebrate Ether price climb above $3,800 , taking a jab at critics who mocked him earlier this year for supporting the cryptocurrency. ‚ÄúHow am I doing now @TedPillows?‚Äù Trump posted, referring to a three-month-old remark from Ted Pillows, a partner at crypto exchange OKX, who had mocked Trump in April following Ether‚Äôs decline in February and March. Trump continued his online rebuttals by telling another user, ‚ÄúUp 35% in 5 months, Pal. Embrace volatility,‚Äù adding that those who followed his advice to ‚Äúbuy the dips‚Äù would now be in profit. Data from CoinGecko shows that Ether was trading at around $2,877 when Trump announced his support for the coin on February 4. At its current level near $3,732, investors would be sitting on roughly 30% in unrealized gains, despite the coin experiencing a steep 49% drop shortly after Trump‚Äôs post earlier in the year. Ether Eyes $8,000 as Analysts Track Patterns While Ether has gained 12% so far in 2025, some analysts are seeing a bigger move on the horizon. On Sunday, analyst Gert van Lagen noted a similarity between Ether‚Äôs current structure and the Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA) in 1980, predicting that Ether could reach $8,000 by early 2026 as it enters what he believes is the final phase of its long-term bullish cycle. These comments arrive amid a broader crypto market recovery, with Ether leading a steady rally over the past month. Renewed optimism around Ethereum‚Äôs network upgrades, increasing institutional interest in tokenization, and reduced selling pressure have all contributed to its recent price gains, strengthening bullish sentiment in the market. Trump Family‚Äôs Expanding Crypto Footprint The Trump family‚Äôs involvement in crypto ventures extends beyond social media posts. On Monday, Trump Media and Technology Group, which operates the Truth Social platform, announced it holds $2 billion worth of Bitcoin and Bitcoin-related securities. The company has raised $2.5 billion to support its Bitcoin strategy, with plans to expand its crypto holdings based on market conditions. Eric Trump, along with his brothers Donald Trump Jr. and Barron Trump, co-founded American Bitcoin, a company that has raised $220 million to acquire Bitcoin for its treasury and to purchase mining equipment. Additionally, all three brothers are co-founders of World Liberty Financial , where President Trump serves as co-founder emeritus. This reflects the family‚Äôs increasing influence within the cryptocurrency industry as the sector evolves alongside the upcoming election cycle. The post Eric Trump Mocks Critics Amid Ether Price Surge, What‚Äôs Next for Crypto? appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .
TAGS: Market News|Eric Trump crypto|ETH price today|Ether price surge

HEADLINE: XRP Could Skyrocket 500% Against Bitcoin, Analyst Warns
SUMMARY: CryptoInsightUK believes the long-awaited altcoin season has finally begun‚Äîand that XRP could be its headline act. In a 13-minute market update posted on July 21, the British analyst argued that last week‚Äôs dramatic collapse in Bitcoin dominance ‚Äúerased 19 weeks of Bitcoin strength in a single candle,‚Äù a move he called the first clear signal of a sustained rotation into altcoins. ‚ÄúVolume tells the story,‚Äù he said, pointing to the outsized red bar that accompanied the dominance drop. The pattern, he noted, mirrors the December 2020 setup that preceded the last explosive altcoin cycle. If dominance continues to unwind at a comparable speed, it could slip to the 39 percent zone within seven weeks‚Äîgiving altcoins room to outperform. XRP Could Rally 500% Against Bitcoin That macro backdrop matters because, in the same breath, XRP just printed the highest weekly close in its history. CryptoInsightUK highlighted an ‚Äúaccumulation-then-breakout‚Äù structure on the XRP/USD chart that resembles Bitcoin-dominance‚Äôs own staircase lower. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs continuation, in my opinion,‚Äù he said, adding that XRP‚Äôs breach of its 2017-2018 all-time-high band could usher in a series of higher highs. Related Reading: XRP Targets $6‚Äì$10 If Bitcoin Hits $144,000, Analyst Predicts Liquidity data bolsters the thesis. Heat-maps from TradingDifferent show ‚Äúsignificant liquidity to the upside‚Ä¶ all the way now up to about $4.26,‚Äù the analyst said. He expects XRP to attack that magnet ‚Äúprobably within this week‚Äù and believes a run to $4.50 is ‚Äúimminent‚Äù if Bitcoin breaks its nearby resistance shelf. The bolder call, however, is denominated in satoshis. With XRP/BTC perched just below its last meaningful resistance, CryptoInsightUK sees scope for a rally of ‚Äúat least another 200 percent‚Äîpotentially up to 500 percent‚Äîagainst Bitcoin‚Äù once the pair clears the level. Such a move, he argued, would propel XRP‚Äôs market-share to the 14‚Äì20 percent range, up from roughly 2 percent today, and would likely coincide with Bitcoin itself pushing toward the $135,000‚Äì$150,000 corridor. ‚ÄúThings are going to get exciting pretty quick,‚Äù he warned, urging followers to prepare profit-taking plans in advance. Related Reading: The XRP Euphoria Phase: Why August‚ÄìOctober 2025 Could Be Explosive Though the video focused on XRP, the analyst revealed he recently took full profits on his sizeable Ethena (ENA) position after a 100 percent gain in two weeks, citing over-exposure and extreme daily RSI readings. The sale, he said, lifted his cash buffer from 2 percent to about 5 percent, giving him ‚Äúthe opportunity to hold my XRP bag for longer‚Äù. CryptoInsightUK acknowledged that timing any cycle top is notoriously difficult. ‚ÄúNo one nails the cycle,‚Äù he conceded, promising to disclose his own exit strategy in real-time once price action justifies it. For traders who do not ‚Äúlive the charts,‚Äù he recommended a disciplined take-profit plan rather than aiming for absolute peaks. For now, the spotlight stays on two charts: Bitcoin dominance and XRP/BTC. A decisive breakdown in the former and a clean breakout in the latter would, in the analyst‚Äôs words, ‚Äúignite altseason‚Äù and validate the 500 percent upside scenario. Whether that firework display begins this week or takes a little longer, he insisted, ‚Äúthere‚Äôs no reason we couldn‚Äôt do something like this‚Äù‚Äîand sketched a near-vertical path higher. At press time, XRP traded at $3.46. Featured image created with DALL.E, chart from TradingView.com
TAGS: XRP News|xrp|XRP Dominance|xrp news|XRP Price|XRP Technical Analysis|XRPBTC

HEADLINE: Retail Dumps Bitcoin (BTC) on Binance as Whales Quietly Load Up
SUMMARY: Bitcoin is currently trading above $118,000, and while it hasn‚Äôt yet been able to reclaim last week‚Äôs all-time high, the asset is still almost 15% up over the past month. Despite the ongoing bullish sentiment, retail investors are still offloading Bitcoin on Binance as evidenced by a surge in retail inflows that aligns with signs of profit-taking. Retail Selling Into Strength According to the latest figures shared by CryptoQuant, Binance‚Äôs 30-day retail inflow has spiked from $12 billion to over $16 billion. This was indicative of an increased selling activity as BTC‚Äôs price climbed toward recent highs. A similar pattern emerged in April 2025, when Bitcoin rose from $78,000 to $111,000 by the end of May. During this time, retail traders also offloaded significant portions of their holdings amidst the uptrend and ultimately missed out on the full upside. This recurring behavior points to a tendency among retail investors to sell into strength. Such behaviour is likely driven by fear or short-term profit motives, rather than holding for potential further gains. Further confirming this sell-off pattern, Binance‚Äôs Net Taker Volume has turned negative, which reflects a bearish sentiment among market takers. Negative net taker volume indicates that sellers are dominating, either by liquidating long positions or entering new short positions in anticipation of a potential pullback. This sentiment among retail traders suggests that many remain unconvinced of the rally‚Äôs sustainability. On the other hand, whales are aggressively accumulating during this period of retail selling. Data from Whales Screener reveals that in the past 24 hours alone, whales have withdrawn over $400 million in Ethereum and nearly $200 million in Bitcoin from centralized exchanges. Such large withdrawals typically indicate a firm belief in a continued market uptrend, as whales use the liquidity from retail sellers to build positions. This behavior is consistent with past trends where retail exits during rallies while whales continue accumulating. Bitcoin‚Äôs Path to $140K Amid this divergence between retail selling and whale accumulation, attention is now turning to what analysts expect for Bitcoin‚Äôs next major move. Analyst Mr. Wall Street, for one, expects Bitcoin to climb to $140,000 mid-term, but warned that sell-side pressures may cap gains. The crypto asset has held above $117,000 and aims for $120,000-$123,500 short-term before a potential run toward $133,000-$140,000. However, wallets that accumulated BTC during the 2022 lows are now offloading. This pattern was seen before previous cycle peaks. The post Retail Dumps Bitcoin (BTC) on Binance as Whales Quietly Load Up appeared first on CryptoPotato .

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Holdings: Genius Group‚Äôs Ambitious Leap Towards 10,000 BTC
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Holdings: Genius Group‚Äôs Ambitious Leap Towards 10,000 BTC In an era where digital assets are reshaping traditional finance, an exciting trend is emerging: established companies embracing cryptocurrencies. But what if an AI-driven education company not only embraced it but set an incredibly ambitious target? This is precisely what Genius Group, a pioneer in AI-driven education, has done by significantly expanding its Bitcoin holdings , signaling a profound commitment to the future of digital finance and blockchain technology. Understanding Genius Group‚Äôs Bold Move in Bitcoin Holdings Imagine a company not just dipping its toes but diving headfirst into the world of cryptocurrency. That‚Äôs Genius Group for you. In July, this innovative AI-driven education company made headlines by doubling its Bitcoin holdings to a substantial 200 BTC. This wasn‚Äôt just a casual purchase; it was a strategic move, acquiring 20 BTC at a discount, as reported by Cointelegraph. What makes this particularly fascinating is their audacious long-term vision: to accumulate a staggering 10,000 BTC within the next two years. This commitment to increasing their Bitcoin holdings is more than just an investment; it‚Äôs a statement. It positions Genius Group as a forward-thinking entity that recognizes the transformative potential of digital assets. For an education company, integrating such a significant financial strategy with their core business is a testament to their belief in the future convergence of technology, finance, and learning. To put their current and target Bitcoin holdings into perspective, consider the following: Metric Current (July 2023) Ambitious Target (Next 2 Years) Bitcoin Holdings (BTC) 200 BTC 10,000 BTC Growth Factor Doubled from previous 50x increase from current Acquisition Strategy Discounted purchases Aggressive accumulation Beyond Accumulation: Genius Group‚Äôs Broader Crypto Strategy and Bitcoin Holdings Genius Group‚Äôs ambition extends far beyond merely accumulating Bitcoin holdings . Their strategy is multi-faceted, aiming to weave blockchain and cryptocurrency into the very fabric of their educational ecosystem. This holistic approach suggests a long-term commitment to the digital economy, not just as an investor, but as an active participant and innovator. Expanding Blockchain Education Initiatives: As an education company, it‚Äôs only natural for Genius Group to lead by example. They are actively developing and expanding educational programs focused on blockchain technology. This means equipping students and professionals with the knowledge and skills necessary to thrive in a decentralized future, understanding everything from crypto fundamentals to advanced blockchain applications. Developing Tokenized Rewards: Imagine being rewarded for your learning achievements with digital tokens! Genius Group is exploring tokenized reward systems, which could revolutionize how students are incentivized and recognized. This innovative approach could foster greater engagement and create a tangible value for educational milestones within their ecosystem. Introducing Stablecoins: The development of stablecoins within their framework suggests an aim to provide a more predictable and less volatile digital currency for transactions within their platform. Stablecoins, pegged to traditional assets like the US dollar, can offer the benefits of blockchain technology without the dramatic price swings often associated with cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin. Pursuing U.S. Licenses under the GENIUS Act: A critical component of their strategy is navigating the regulatory landscape. By actively pursuing U.S. licenses under what they refer to as the ‚ÄòGENIUS Act,‚Äô the company demonstrates a commitment to operating within established legal frameworks. This step is crucial for building trust, ensuring compliance, and facilitating broader adoption of their crypto initiatives. Why Are Companies Like Genius Group Increasing Their Bitcoin Holdings? The decision by companies to significantly increase their Bitcoin holdings isn‚Äôt made lightly. It reflects a growing recognition of Bitcoin‚Äôs unique properties and its potential role in a diversified corporate treasury strategy. So, what are the compelling reasons behind such a bold move? Inflation Hedge: In an environment of economic uncertainty and rising inflation, Bitcoin is increasingly viewed as a potential hedge against the devaluation of fiat currencies. Its finite supply makes it a scarce asset, often compared to digital gold. Store of Value: Over its history, Bitcoin has demonstrated its ability to act as a robust store of value, especially over longer time horizons. Companies see it as a way to preserve and potentially grow their capital outside of traditional financial instruments. Innovation and Future-Proofing: Embracing Bitcoin and blockchain technology signals a company‚Äôs commitment to innovation. It helps them stay relevant in a rapidly evolving digital landscape and c

HEADLINE: Billionaire Jack Dorsey‚Äôs Bitcoin Treasury Company Block Joins S&P 500 Index
SUMMARY: Jack Dorsey‚Äôs Bitcoin ( BTC ) fintech firm Block is about to join the S&P 500. Block announced last week that effective July 23rd, the firm will be part of the top index, which tracks the stock performance of 500 large companies listed on US stock exchanges. The tech billionaire‚Äôs firm was previously known as Square and is recognized for payment services like Cash App, and also launched a self-custody BTC wallet called Bitkey. Additionally, Block owns the 12th-largest public corporate Bitcoin treasury in the world, holding 8,584 BTC worth around $1.01 billion at time of writing. The firm is sitting on a 286% unrealized profit on its BTC, according to BitcoinTreasuries.net . In April, Block settled with the New York Department of Financial Services (NYDFS) amid alleged compliance issues with its Bank Secrecy Act/Anti-Money Laundering (BSA/AML) program. NYDFS says Block committed lapses with how it operated Cash App, the firm‚Äôs peer-to-peer money transmission service that began offering BTC transactions back in 2018. The regulator alleged Block failed to complete adequate customer due diligence and implement controls to prevent anti-money laundering and other illicit activities. NYDFS also claimed the company did not promptly address severe transaction alert backlogs, largely due to rapid growth between 2019 and 2020. The regulator alleged Block‚Äôs lax treatment of high-risk Bitcoin transactions enabled anonymous transactions to push through without proper scrutiny. HEADLINE: We Asked 4 AIs What Ripple‚Äôs (XRP) Peak Price Will Be in This Bull Cycle: the Answers Will Surprise You
SUMMARY: TL;DR Ripple‚Äôs cross-border token already charted a new all-time high this cycle and stands close below it now. The XRP Army continues to be highly bullish on the asset, with massive double-digit price predictions. As such, we decided to ask the four most popular AI solutions (ChatGPT, Grok, Perplexity, and Gemini) about their take on its peak this cycle. Peak Goals Building on our ‚ÄòWe Asked‚Ä¶‚Äô collection of crypto-oriented questions, more on which you can read here and here , this time, we wanted to know what the AIs think about XRP‚Äôs potential this cycle. After all, it already did what many thought was impossible and broke its January 2018 all-time high of $3.4 last week by surging past $3.6 to set a new one. The AIs in question provided a few types of answers when it came down to price predictions, ranging from ‚Äúrealistic‚Äù to ‚Äúaggressive/far-fetched.‚Äù Perplexity, for example, noted that the majority of crypto analysts on X believe the asset will peak somewhere between $5 and $10. Basing its projections on technical analysis, the chatbot mostly reaffirmed its target, setting it at $6 to $8 or even $10 under more favorable conditions. Gemini‚Äôs moderate/conservative estimates envision a top of $6, while the so-called ‚Äúbullish but achievable targets‚Äù are similar to those of Perplexity. ‚ÄúBullish but Achievable Targets: A common range for a strong bull run is $7-$10. This is often cited by analysts who believe in significant institutional adoption and a favorable regulatory environment. Some predictions suggest XRP could reach $7.5-$8.2 by August 2025, and $9.0-$9.8 by September 2025, potentially hitting $18-$20 by December 2025.‚Äù Grok and ChatGPT were less bullish on XRP‚Äôs potential this cycle, outlining $5.50 ot $7 as the ‚Äúmoderate‚Äù scenarios. When it came down to the aggressive approach, both said the asset could surpass $10 and aim at $15. Factors That Can Drive XRP This High Although their price ranges may vary slightly, the four AI solutions were essentially in agreement about the potential factors that could drive XRP to these heights. For example, they all believe a spot Ripple ETF will help the underlying asset thrive, similar to BTC and ETH as of late. The chances for such a financial product to see the green light by the end of the year are pretty high, with both experts and Polymarket displaying them at roughly 90%. The AIs also noted that massive capital rotation from Bitcoin to alts will help XRP, which is the second-largest altcoin, gain further traction. Additionally, they outlined corporate/central bank settlement pilots using the XRP Ledger as well as the ISO 20022 update, which is believed to help Ripple‚Äôs token. Nevertheless, the AIs highlighted the market‚Äôs volatile nature and warned that these numbers are merely predictions. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs crucial to remember that these are predictions and not guarantees. The cryptocurrency market is highly volatile, and prices can change rapidly. Always conduct your own research and consider the inherent risks before making any investment decisions.‚Äù The post We Asked 4 AIs What Ripple‚Äôs (XRP) Peak Price Will Be in This Bull Cycle: the Answers Will Surprise You appeared first on CryptoPotato .

HEADLINE: This crypto is now BlackRock‚Äôs 3rd largest holding
SUMMARY: Imagen Network (IMAGE), a low-cap token built on the Solana blockchain, has unexpectedly emerged as BlackRock‚Äôs third-largest crypto holding, according to on-chain portfolio tracking data . Despite its sharp price decline since launch, the asset now sits behind only Bitcoin ( BTC ) and Ethereum ( ETH ) in BlackRock‚Äôs digital asset allocation. At the time of publication, IMAGE is trading at $0.004407, down 8.22% on the day, with a total market capitalization of just over $22 million. Over the past week, the token has plummeted by 45.65%, and since its launch on June 12, it has dropped over 80%. Year-to-date, IMAGE is down 84.56%. Imagen Network price. Source: Arkham BlackRock holds over 100 million IMAGE tokens Despite the sell-off, BlackRock currently holds 101 million IMAGE tokens, valued at approximately $445,920, making it the firm‚Äôs third-largest crypto position, just ahead of SPX. The fund‚Äôs crypto portfolio is still dominated by Bitcoin, with over 720,000 BTC worth $85.6 billion, and Ethereum, with 2.14 million ETH valued at $7.91 billion. Imagen Network held by BlackRock. Source: Arkham Other major entities such as a16z, VanEck, Purpose Investments, and Abraxas Capital also hold significant IMAGE positions. However, over the past 7 days, each of these funds has seen the USD value of their IMAGE holdings drop by nearly 41%, as sentiment around the token cooled. Imagen Network value held by funds. Source: Arkham The token‚Äôs appeal appears to lie in its underlying tech stack and early institutional interest, though the steep decline highlights the volatility risk tied to low-liquidity, emerging assets in the crypto space. Built on Solana, Imagen Network markets itself as a decentralized framework for identity and content provenance, but it remains to be seen whether the fundamentals will catch up to early backer enthusiasm. The post This crypto is now BlackRock‚Äôs 3rd largest holding appeared first on Finbold .

HEADLINE: Bitcoin‚Äôs Phenomenal Rise: What Does $119,000 Mean for the Market?
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin‚Äôs Phenomenal Rise: What Does $119,000 Mean for the Market? The cryptocurrency world is abuzz with excitement as Bitcoin, the undisputed king of digital assets, recently achieved a remarkable milestone, soaring past the $119,000 mark. This significant leap in the Bitcoin price has captured global attention, prompting investors, analysts, and enthusiasts alike to ponder its implications for the broader market. What exactly does this monumental achievement signify, and what factors are propelling Bitcoin to such unprecedented heights? Understanding the Bitcoin Price Milestone: A Closer Look at $119,000 According to diligent monitoring by Bitcoin World market, BTC has indeed risen above $119,000, specifically trading at $119,020 on the Binance USDT market. This isn‚Äôt just a number; it represents a significant psychological and technical level for many in the crypto space. While Bitcoin has seen numerous rallies and corrections throughout its history, each new peak or sustained high value ignites fresh discussions about its intrinsic value, adoption rates, and future potential. Such a robust movement in the Bitcoin price often signals strong market confidence and a confluence of bullish factors. It reflects a growing belief in Bitcoin‚Äôs role as a store of value, a hedge against inflation, and an increasingly accepted digital asset in the global financial landscape. For many, reaching this level is a testament to Bitcoin‚Äôs resilience and its evolving narrative from a niche digital experiment to a serious contender in the world of finance. What‚Äôs Fueling This Bitcoin Price Ascent? Key Drivers Behind the Rally Several intertwined factors contribute to Bitcoin‚Äôs impressive upward trajectory. Understanding these drivers is crucial for anyone looking to grasp the dynamics of the current Bitcoin price rally. Institutional Adoption: One of the most significant catalysts is the increasing embrace by institutional investors. Major corporations, investment funds, and even some sovereign entities are now allocating portions of their portfolios to digital assets. This institutional validation not only brings substantial capital into the market but also lends an air of legitimacy and stability, attracting more mainstream attention. The launch of new financial products, such as spot Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs) in various jurisdictions, has opened doors for a wider range of investors to gain exposure to Bitcoin without directly holding the asset, further boosting demand and influencing the Bitcoin price . Supply Dynamics (Halving Event): Bitcoin‚Äôs supply is finite, capped at 21 million coins. Approximately every four years, the reward for mining new blocks is halved, a process known as the ‚Äòhalving.‚Äô This reduces the rate at which new Bitcoins enter circulation, effectively creating a supply shock if demand remains constant or increases. Historical data often shows a significant Bitcoin price rally in the months following a halving event, as scarcity plays a crucial role. Macroeconomic Environment: Global economic conditions also play a vital role. When traditional markets face uncertainty, inflation concerns rise, or fiat currencies experience instability, investors often look for alternative assets to preserve wealth. Bitcoin, with its decentralized nature and perceived inflation-hedging properties, becomes an attractive option, driving up its demand and consequently the Bitcoin price . Technological Advancements and Network Growth: Continuous development within the Bitcoin ecosystem, such as improvements in scalability (e.g., Lightning Network) and security, enhances its utility and attractiveness. A growing number of users, transactions, and developers building on the network signal a healthy and expanding ecosystem, which positively reinforces the Bitcoin price . Growing Retail Interest: While institutional money is powerful, the collective buying power and enthusiasm of retail investors remain a significant force. Increased media coverage, social media trends, and word-of-mouth generate broader public interest, leading to more individuals entering the market and contributing to the upward pressure on the Bitcoin price . The Ripple Effect: How the Bitcoin Price Impacts the Wider Crypto Ecosystem When Bitcoin makes significant moves, the entire cryptocurrency market tends to feel the tremors. Bitcoin‚Äôs dominance often dictates the overall market sentiment, and its price action frequently serves as a leading indicator for altcoins. Altcoin Performance: A strong Bitcoin price rally often precedes or accompanies a surge in altcoin prices. This phenomenon, sometimes called ‚Äòaltcoin season,‚Äô occurs as profits from Bitcoin are rotated into other promising digital assets, or as newfound confidence in the overall crypto market encourages investment across the board. Market Sentiment: Bitcoin‚Äôs performance profoundly impacts investor psychology. A rising Bitcoin price fosters optimism, reduces fear, and
