HEADLINE: Bitcoin Dominance Falls‚ÄîAltseason Takeover or Quiet Before $140K BTC Surge?
SUMMARY: Bitcoin‚Äôs share in the cryptocurrency market is declining, sparking curiosity and debate. Is a surge in alternative coins on the horizon, signaling a new market leader? Or is this a temporary dip before Bitcoin climbs to an unprecedented $140,000? The shifting dynamics are drawing attention, leaving many eager to see what unfolds next. Demand for $XYZ Surges As Its Capitalization Approaches the $15M Milestone The XYZVerse ($XYZ) project, which merges the worlds of sports and crypto, has attracted significant investor interest. Unlike typical memecoins, XYZVerse positions itself as a long-term initiative with a clear roadmap and an engaged community. The project was recently recognized as Best NEW Meme Project , further solidifying its appeal. Price Dynamics and Listing Plans During its presale phase, the $XYZ token has shown steady growth. Since its launch, the price has increased from $0.0001 to $0.003333, with the next stage set to push it further to $0.005. The final presale price is $0.02, after which the token will be listed on major centralized and decentralized exchanges. The projected listing price of $0.10 could generate up to 1,000x returns for early investors, provided the project secures the necessary market capitalization. So far, more than $14 million has been raised, and the presale is approaching another significant milestone of $15 million . This fast progress is signaling strong demand from both retail and institutional investors. Champions Get Rewarded In XYZVerse , the community calls the plays . Active contributors aren‚Äôt just spectators‚Äîthey‚Äôre rewarded with airdropped XYZ tokens for their dedication. It‚Äôs a game where the most passionate players win big. The Road to Victory With solid tokenomics, strategic CEX and DEX listings, and consistent token burns, $XYZ is built for a championship run. Every play is designed to push it further, to strengthen its price , and to rally a community of believers who believe this is the start of something legendary. Airdrops, Rewards, and More ‚Äì Join XYZVerse to Unlock All the Benefits Bitcoin: The Digital Coin Reshaping Our Money World Bitcoin, or BTC, is the first of its kind‚Äîa digital currency that lets you send money directly to others without a bank. Think of it as electronic cash that works over the internet. It was created by someone called Satoshi Nakamoto to make transactions simple and free from control by any single authority. Instead of physical coins, Bitcoin operates on a shared record called the blockchain. This means every transaction is tracked across many computers, keeping it secure and open. People known as miners help verify these transactions by solving puzzles, earning new bitcoins as a reward. There‚Äôs a limit of 21 million bitcoins, making each one special. Today, Bitcoin stands out in the financial world. Every four years or so, the rewards for miners are cut in half in an event called a ‚Äúhalving.‚Äù This slows down how quickly new bitcoins are made, which can make existing ones more valuable. While new cryptocurrencies pop up all the time, Bitcoin remains the most famous and trusted. Its limited supply and growing use by businesses make it an attractive choice in the current market. With more people and companies embracing it, Bitcoin‚Äôs future looks bright in the ever-changing landscape of digital money. Ethereum‚Äôs Next Leap: Scaling Up for a Decentralized Future Ethereum, launched by Vitalik Buterin in 2015, has been a game-changer in the blockchain world. As a pioneering Proof-of-Stake blockchain, it introduced smart contracts that power a vast ecosystem of decentralized applications (dApps). From decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms to non-fungible tokens (NFTs), Ethereum‚Äôs versatility is unmatched. The network‚Äôs transition to Proof-of-Stake with the Merge in 2022 marked a significant evolution, reducing energy consumption and setting the stage for increased scalability. Upcoming innovations like sharding aim to boost transaction speeds and lower costs, while Layer 2 solutions such as Arbitrum and Polygon enhance efficiency. Ether (ETH) remains the heartbeat of this ecosystem, essential for transactions and rewarding those who help secure the network. In the current market cycle, Ethereum‚Äôs advancements make it a standout among cryptocurrencies. Price predictions suggest that ETH could reach as high as $6,580.53 next year, reflecting optimism based on historical trends and Bitcoin‚Äôs halving cycles. Compared to other coins, Ethereum‚Äôs robust technology and active development community give it a competitive edge. Market trends indicate a growing interest in platforms that offer scalability and real-world applications, areas where Ethereum excels. Its commitment to decentralization and continuous improvement positions it attractively for those watching the crypto space evolve. HEADLINE: Why Is Crypto Down Today? ‚Äì July 22, 2025
SUMMARY: With a drop of 4.6% over the last 24 hours, the cryptocurrency market capitalization has dipped below the recently conquered $4 trillion, now standing at $3.99 trillion. Overall, the market is down today, with the large majority of the top 100 coins per market capitalization decreasing. At the same time, the total crypto trading volume is at $269 billion, still maintaining similar levels to those seen over the past week. TLDR: Crypto market cap dipped below $4 trillion; Majority of top 100 coins are red; BTC and ETH are down today, trading at $117,854 and $3,692; ETH outperforms BTC in weekly increases: 20% vs 1%; Solana is the only green coin among the top 10 per market cap; Market sentiment remains in the greed zone; US BTC spot ETFs broke a green streak with $131 million in outflows; US ETH spot ETFs continue positive flows with 12 straight days of inflows; We are in the 5th and final wave of the bull market; There seems to be ‚Äúgenuine institutional adoption,‚Äù and ‚Äúnot speculative fever‚Äù. Crypto Winners & Losers Over the past 24 hours, at the time of writing, only one of the top 10 coins per market cap is green. Bitcoin (BTC) fell by 1.2% in this period to the price of $117,854. While it decreased below $118,000, it‚Äôs holding firmly above $117,500. Also, Ethereum (ETH) fell by 2.7%, currently trading at $3,692. The price is still on track towards the $4,000 mark. The highest drop is 3.2% by Dogecoin (DOGE) . It‚Äôs now trading at $0.2647. The only green coin on this list is Solana (SOL) . It appreciated 5.1%, currently changing hands at $198.97. In the top 100 coins category, Kaspa (KAS) is the highest gainer. It‚Äôs up 9.8% to the price of $0.1153. Jupiter (JUP) follows with an increase of 8.6%, now trading at $0.6531. Most coins, however, recorded price decreases today. Pump.fun (PUMP) saw a double-digit drop of 13.1% to $0.003751. SPX6900 (SPX) follows, with a 6.7% fall to the price of $1.84. The capital flowing out of Bitcoin ETFs, as discussed below, could suggest lowered institutional appetite, though likely a short-term one. This appetite is likely dampened by concerns around global tariffs and trade tensions, particularly as the 1 August deadline approaches when the US may slap massive tariffs on its trade partners, push the deadline, or change its mind again. Meanwhile, JPMorgan Chase is reportedly looking into l ending against clients‚Äô Bitcoin and Ethereum holdings starting next year. Lending against crypto would let users pledge their BTC and ETH holdings to borrow loans. JPMorgan''s head, Jamie Dimon, confirmed that the bank will soon let clients buy Bitcoin but not custody it. #JPMorgan #Bitcoin #JamieDimon https://t.co/ZdCOy8Q1ou ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) May 20, 2025 ‚ÄòBull Market Will End by 2026 with BTC at $140,000‚Äô John Glover, Chief Investment Officer of Ledn , recently commented that price action continued to support the wave count he discussed for the last few years. We are in the 5 th and final wave of the bull market, as the chart below shows. It should complete towards the end of 2025 or early 2026, at a BTC price of some $136,000 to $140,000, he said. ‚ÄúSo while people will be worried about where the bear market will take us in 2026, my view is that this is not something to worry about today, as there is still additional upside to BTC prices in this bull market! Stay focused on participating in and enjoying the ride higher until the end of the year.‚Äù However, he warns that if BTC trades below $112,000 in the short term, we could see another test of $100,000 before the next move up. ‚ÄúBut this is a low probability outcome in my view,‚Äù Glover argues. Source: Ledn Moreover, Werner Br√∂nnimann, Investment Manager at crypto bank AMINA , commented that Bitcoin‚Äôs recent push to over $123,000 and breaching $4 trillion market cap appears to represent a fundamental shift in market dynamics. This shift is driven primarily by institutional capital, not ‚Äúthe retail-led manias of previous cycles.‚Äù Now, there seems to be ‚Äúgenuine institutional adoption,‚Äù and ‚Äúnot speculative fever.‚Äù Moreover, we‚Äôre seeing sustained inflows from pension funds and corporate treasuries, not social media-driven FOMO (fear of missing out), Br√∂nnimann says. Still, ‚Äúdespite Bitcoin‚Äôs remarkable performance, the market is not officially in ‚ÄòAltcoin Season‚Äô yet,‚Äù he adds. That said, the macro environment could still challenge BTC‚Äôs trajectory regardless of institutional adoption, says Br√∂nnimann. Regulatory clarity supports institutional inflows, but BTC remains sensitive to monetary policy shifts. ‚ÄúAggressive [US Federal Reserve] tightening in response to tariff-driven inflation could override even strong institutional demand.‚Äù Therefore, ‚Äúthis dynamic underscores Bitcoin‚Äôs evolution as institutional money continues to flow into the asset class: it is no longer an alternative asset with its purely idiosyncratic return drivers, but to an extent behaves like a risk-on asset,‚Äù Br√∂nnimann concludes. Levels & Events to Watch

HEADLINE: Tron outperformed Bitcoin without an altseason
SUMMARY: Tron (TRX) is emerging as an unexpected frontrunner in the crypto market‚Äôs latest rotation, outperforming Bitcoin (BTC) since March, prompting analysts to consider whether a more selective form of altseason is already underway. New data from blockchain analytics firms CryptoQuant and Nansen shows TRX is gaining momentum amid a broader consolidation of Bitcoin‚Äôs market dominance. While BTC continues to lead institutional flows, the recent decoupling of TRX from Bitcoin‚Äôs price action has triggered renewed discussion about altcoin market cycles, though with a more tempered outlook than in past bull runs. ‚ÄúWe might not see a broad altseason in 2025,‚Äù a CryptoQuant analyst wrote in a recent post . ‚ÄúInstead, a selected group of ‚Äòpremium‚Äô altcoins will likely outperform Bitcoin.‚Äù TRX decouples from BTC amid strong network activity Tron‚Äôs recent outperformance is not just speculative; it‚Äôs backed by on-chain data. In the past 24 hours alone, the network registered over 2.55 million active addresses (up 12.6%) and more than 9 million daily transactions (up 15.6%) in the early hours of Tuesday, July 22, according to analytics platform Nansen. That level of throughput places Tron ahead of many layer 1 competitors in terms of usage and consistency. Tron‚Äôs 24-hour transactions and active address data. Source: Nansen . ‚ÄúStable, consistent, and busy,‚Äù Nansen wrote in a post summarizing Tron‚Äôs real-time activity metrics. At the time of concluding this story, there have been some significant movements on Tron‚Äôs chain growth data as captured by Nansen, with the transaction volume being roughly 3% down. It now has 2.54 million active addresses (up 11.07%) and 8.99 million daily transactions (up 12.07%) over the past 24 hours. CryptoQuant notes that the price correlation between TRX and BTC, which had remained relatively tight earlier this year, has now ‚Äúdecoupled,‚Äù a technical shift that often precedes a redistribution of capital into higher-beta altcoins. This divergence is comparable to similar setups observed in previous altcoin rallies, such as those in 2017 and 2021. Correlation and divergence of Bitcoin and Tron price & volume. Source: CryptoQuant . However, unlike in past cycles where capital indiscriminately rotated across dozens of tokens, this time, the capital appears more focused. A narrower, more selective altseason One key difference in this cycle, according to analysts, is the muted retail participation and the absence of a traditional ‚Äúaltseason‚Äù where nearly all non-BTC tokens rally simultaneously. Instead, market observers expect a handful of altcoins, like TRX, to lead based on utility, network usage, and stablecoin integrations. Indeed, TRX‚Äôs daily transaction count now rivals that of Ethereum and Solana. Much of this activity is powered by USDT (Tether) stablecoin transfers, with Tron accounting for over 50% of all Tether volume. That utility has underpinned TRX‚Äôs latest breakout above key resistance levels. Despite TRX‚Äôs bullish momentum, analysts caution that Bitcoin‚Äôs dominance remains above 50%, which may delay or disrupt full-scale altcoin rallies, according to analysts. Ethereum and Solana continue to attract institutional narratives around real-world assets (RWAs) and tokenized securities, but TRX is carving out its niche by delivering sustained activity without the congestion or high fees plaguing its rivals. Still, skeptics remain. Tron‚Äôs reputation has been marred in past years by regulatory scrutiny surrounding founder Justin Sun, and its DeFi ecosystem lacks the composability and capital depth of Ethereum‚Äôs. Yet the raw numbers suggest TRX is one of the few tokens bucking Bitcoin‚Äôs gravitational pull, and doing so with considerable consistency. text: Tron outperformed Bitcoin without an altseason. Tron (TRX) is emerging as an unexpected frontrunner in the crypto market‚Äôs latest rotation, outperforming Bitcoin (BTC) since March, prompting analysts to consider whether a more selective form of altseason is already underway. New data from blockchain analytics firms CryptoQuant and Nansen shows TRX is gaining momentum amid a broader consolidation of Bitcoin‚Äôs market dominance. While BTC continues to lead institutional flows, the recent decoupling of TRX from Bitcoin‚Äôs price action has triggered renewed discussion about altcoin market cycles, though with a more tempered outlook than in past bull runs. ‚ÄúWe might not see a broad altseason in 2025,‚Äù a CryptoQuant analyst wrote in a recent post . ‚ÄúInstead, a selected group of ‚Äòpremium‚Äô altcoins will likely outperform Bitcoin.‚Äù TRX decouples from BTC amid strong network activity Tron‚Äôs recent outperformance is not just speculative; it‚Äôs backed by on-chain data. In the past 24 hours alone, the network registered over 2.55 million active addresses (up 12.6%) and more than 9 million daily transactions (up 15.6%) in the early hours of Tuesday, July 22, according to analytics platform Nansen. That level of throughput places Tron ahead of many layer 1 competitors in terms of usage and consistency. Tron‚Äôs 24-hour transactions and active address data. Source: Nansen . ‚ÄúStable, consistent, and busy,‚Äù Nansen wrote in a post summarizing Tron‚Äôs real-time activity metrics. At the time of concluding this story, there have been some significant movements on Tron‚Äôs chain growth data as captured by Nansen, with the transaction volume being roughly 3% down. It now has 2.54 million active addresses (up 11.07%) and 8.99 million daily transactions (up 12.07%) over the past 24 hours. CryptoQuant notes that the price correlation between TRX and BTC, which had remained relatively tight earlier this year, has now ‚Äúdecoupled,‚Äù a technical shift that often precedes a redistribution of capital into higher-beta altcoins. This divergence is comparable to similar setups observed in previous altcoin rallies, such as those in 2017 and 2021. Correlation and divergence of Bitcoin and Tron price & volume. Source: CryptoQuant . However, unlike in past cycles where capital indiscriminately rotated across dozens of tokens, this time, the capital appears more focused. A narrower, more selective altseason One key difference in this cycle, according to analysts, is the muted retail participation and the absence of a traditional ‚Äúaltseason‚Äù where nearly all non-BTC tokens rally simultaneously. Instead, market observers expect a handful of altcoins, like TRX, to lead based on utility, network usage, and stablecoin integrations. Indeed, TRX‚Äôs daily transaction count now rivals that of Ethereum and Solana. Much of this activity is powered by USDT (Tether) stablecoin transfers, with Tron accounting for over 50% of all Tether volume. That utility has underpinned TRX‚Äôs latest breakout above key resistance levels. Despite TRX‚Äôs bullish momentum, analysts caution that Bitcoin‚Äôs dominance remains above 50%, which may delay or disrupt full-scale altcoin rallies, according to analysts. Ethereum and Solana continue to attract institutional narratives around real-world assets (RWAs) and tokenized securities, but TRX is carving out its niche by delivering sustained activity without the congestion or high fees plaguing its rivals. Still, skeptics remain. Tron‚Äôs reputation has been marred in past years by regulatory scrutiny surrounding founder Justin Sun, and its DeFi ecosystem lacks the composability and capital depth of Ethereum‚Äôs. Yet the raw numbers suggest TRX is one of the few tokens bucking Bitcoin‚Äôs gravitational pull, and doing so with considerable consistency. HEADLINE: Western Union Bets on Stablecoins to Revive Global Remittance Dominance
SUMMARY: The post Western Union Bets on Stablecoins to Revive Global Remittance Dominance appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Western Union, the world‚Äôs oldest name in money transfers, is now betting on stablecoins to keep its place in the changing financial world. Faced with rising competition and dropping revenues, the company is taking bold steps to blend old-school money transfers with modern digital coins. But is it too late, or just the beginning of something bigger? New Plans for a Faster, Cheaper Future Western Union‚Äôs CEO, Devin McGranahan, made it clear this week that stablecoins are not a threat but an opportunity. In a recent interview, he explained how the company wants to let people buy and sell stablecoins through its own platform. By doing this, they hope to cut costs, speed up transfers, and help people move money across borders without the usual banking delays. They‚Äôre already testing new settlement systems in places like South America and Africa regions where people often need fast ways to turn digital dollars into local cash. For many, stablecoins could be a safe place to store money as local currencies lose value. Stablecoins Shake Up Legacy Remittances It‚Äôs no secret that traditional money movers like Western Union and MoneyGram have been feeling the heat. New players like Wise and Remitly brought cheaper, online-only options that ate into their market share. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : US Banking Groups Urge OCC to Delay Ripple, Circle, and Other Crypto Firms‚Äô Banking Licenses , Stablecoins, with their speed, low transaction costs, and liquidity, have increasingly disrupted the traditional remittance industry Meanwhile, the company‚Äôs decision comes amid a 22% drop in Western Union app downloads and a 6% decline in Q1 2025 revenue to $984 million. Even MoneyGram saw this coming and launched its own MoneyGram Wallet last year, which lets people send USDC stablecoins and pick up cash in over 180 countries. Regulation Clears the Path Industry experts say legacy players must adapt to survive, and now is the perfect time as President Trump‚Äôs new GENIUS Act brings clear rules for stablecoins in the US.. With better regulations, big banks and legacy payment companies like Western Union finally feel ready to jump in. HEADLINE: Bitcoin Whale Unveiled: Colossal $35.61 Million Deposit Shakes Binance
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Whale Unveiled: Colossal $35.61 Million Deposit Shakes Binance The cryptocurrency world is often described as the wild west of finance, a realm where fortunes are made and lost in the blink of an eye. Amidst this volatility, certain entities command immense attention: the anonymous giants known as ‚ÄòBitcoin Whales‚Äô. These holders of vast amounts of cryptocurrency can, with a single transaction, send ripples‚Äîor even tidal waves‚Äîthrough the entire market. Recently, the crypto community buzzed with news of just such a move, as an anonymous Bitcoin Whale executed a significant deposit to Binance, one of the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchanges. This event isn‚Äôt just a number; it‚Äôs a potential signal, a whisper from the depths of the market that demands our attention. What Just Happened? The Latest Bitcoin Whale Movement In a move that captured the immediate attention of on-chain analysts, an anonymous Bitcoin Whale recently deposited an additional 300 BTC into Binance Exchange. This significant transfer, valued at approximately $35.61 million at the time of the transaction, wasn‚Äôt just a standalone event. It brought the whale‚Äôs total holdings on the exchange to a staggering 800 BTC, now valued at an impressive $95 million. According to insights shared by Onchain Lens on X, this particular whale has already realized an astounding profit of $93.33 million from their Bitcoin holdings. Latest Deposit: 300 BTC ($35.61 million) Total Holdings on Binance: 800 BTC ($95 million) Realized Profit by the Whale: $93.33 million Such a large deposit to an exchange like Binance immediately raises questions. Is this a strategic move to take profits after a substantial gain? Or is it a repositioning for future trades, perhaps to capitalize on anticipated market shifts? Understanding the implications of such a move requires a deeper dive into the world of these enigmatic market participants. Decoding the Bitcoin Whale: Who Are These Market Movers? The term ‚Äò Bitcoin Whale ‚Äò refers to an individual or entity that holds a substantial amount of Bitcoin. While there‚Äôs no universally agreed-upon threshold, typically, wallets holding 1,000 BTC or more are considered whale wallets. However, even those with hundreds of BTC, like our anonymous depositor, exert considerable influence due to the sheer volume of their holdings relative to the overall market liquidity. These whales can be early adopters who accumulated Bitcoin when it was mere pennies, institutional investors, mining pools, or even cryptocurrency exchanges themselves. Their movements are closely watched because a large transaction can significantly impact market dynamics, either by increasing selling pressure (if they‚Äôre depositing to sell) or signaling accumulation (if they‚Äôre withdrawing to cold storage). Different types of whales often exhibit distinct behaviors, each with potential market implications: Type of Whale Characteristic Behavior Potential Market Impact Early Adopter Whales Often long-term holders (HODLers) with a very low cost basis. May move funds for profit-taking after significant price rallies. Large sell-offs can create temporary price dips or corrections. Institutional Whales Large investment firms, hedge funds, or corporations. Moves are often strategic and driven by broader financial mandates. Significant accumulation can signal growing institutional confidence; large distributions might indicate risk-off sentiment. Exchange Whales Funds held by cryptocurrency exchanges themselves, managing user deposits and withdrawals. Large internal movements are usually for operational purposes (e.g., rebalancing hot/cold wallets) and less indicative of market sentiment. Trader Whales Active participants engaging in frequent large-volume trades. Can contribute to short-term volatility, creating flash pumps or dumps. Why Does a Bitcoin Whale‚Äôs Move on Binance Matter? The choice of exchange for such a substantial deposit is crucial. Binance, being the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, possesses immense liquidity. When a Bitcoin Whale deposits a significant amount of BTC onto Binance, it typically signals an intent to sell or engage in high-volume trading. This influx of Bitcoin into an exchange‚Äôs available supply can, in theory, increase selling pressure. Here‚Äôs why it matters: Potential Selling Pressure: A large deposit increases the amount of Bitcoin available for sale on the open market. If the whale decides to sell all or part of their holdings, it could lead to a sudden increase in supply, potentially driving the price down if demand doesn‚Äôt match. Market Sentiment: Such moves often trigger speculation among traders and investors. The community tries to decipher the whale‚Äôs intentions, which can lead to fear (FUD) or excitement (FOMO), influencing short-term market sentiment. Liquidity Impact: While Binance has deep liquidity, a colossal sell order from a whale can still create a ‚Äòsell wall‚Äô that temporarily halts

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Takes A Breather‚ÄîStrategy Responds With Another $740M Bet
SUMMARY: While the Bitcoin price has cooled off into sideways movement, Strategy has expanded its bet by making yet another large purchase. Strategy Has Just Announced A New Bitcoin Acquisition In a new post on X, Strategy Chairman and co-founder Michael Saylor has shared an announcement for the newest Bitcoin acquisition completed by the company. With this buy, the firm has added 6,220 BTC for $739.8 million to its holdings. This has taken the company‚Äôs total reserve to 607,770 BTC and total invested value to $43.61 billion. According to the filing with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) , the acquisition was made in the week between July 14th and July 20th. In this period, the BTC price only saw sideways movement, but it seems Strategy was unfazed. Like is usually the case, Saylor also teased this new purchase announcement in advance in an X post . The Strategy Chairman said in the post, ‚ÄúStay Humble. Stack Sats,‚Äù and shared this chart. CryptoQuant community analyst Maartunn has shared a chart in an X post that puts into perspective where the latest purchase lines up against the other buys from the past year. As displayed in the above graph, the latest acquisition isn‚Äôt too big in BTC terms in the grand scheme of things. Since the asset‚Äôs price is trading at all-time highs (ATHs), however, the purchase is still expensive in USD terms. The analyst has also shared another chart, this one showcasing the amount of profit that the firm‚Äôs Bitcoin holdings are carrying at the moment. From the graph, it‚Äôs visible that the unrealized gain associated with Strategy‚Äôs Bitcoin holdings has blown up alongside the bull run and today, it sits at a whopping $28 billion. This means that the firm is sitting on more than 64% in the green. In some other news, the Open Interest is diverging between Bitcoin and the altcoins, as Maartunn has pointed out in another X post . The Open Interest measures the total amount of positions related to a given asset or group of assets that are currently open on all centralized derivatives platforms. As is apparent in the chart, the indicator has seen a sharp surge for the altcoins recently, indicating that there has been a flood of speculative interest around them. Bitcoin, on the other hand, has only registered a relatively small uptick in the metric. In the chart, the analyst has highlighted what happened the previous times BTC and the alts diverged in this manner. It would appear that all of these instances coincided with some sort of top for the cryptocurrency. It now remains to be seen whether something similar would follow this time as well. BTC Price At the time of writing, Bitcoin is floating around $117,800, down almost 2% in the last seven days.

HEADLINE: Perplexity Predicts Pi Network Price for this Week
SUMMARY: The post Perplexity Predicts Pi Network Price for this Week appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Pi Coin is making waves today, rising 7.7% to trade at $0.4866 following a technically significant falling wedge breakout. This price rally, driven by a massive spike in trading volume and favorable market sentiment, marks a potential turning point for the token after weeks of consolidation. As Pi‚Äôs app ecosystem expands rapidly, market participants are increasingly optimistic about the Pi coin price. And I thought of bringing to you Perplexity‚Äôs Pi coin price prediction this week. Perplexity‚Äôs Pi Price Analysis Perplexity‚Äôs forecast suggests Pi Coin is expected to trade within the $0.4470‚Äì$0.5200 range this week, with an average price near $0.4820. HEADLINE: Bitcoin''s Demise Is Inevitable
SUMMARY: Summary Bitcoin''s price surge is driven by hype, institutional adoption, and favorable political shifts, not by intrinsic value or improving fundamentals. Trading volumes and active addresses are declining, indicating weakening underlying activity despite rising prices and increased derivatives speculation. Bullish arguments based on HODL trends and futures activity are double-edged, often signaling overextension and a potential bubble rather than sustainable growth. Given deteriorating fundamentals and reliance on speculation, I maintain a ''strong sell'' rating on BTC-USD, expecting a significant price collapse eventually. The problem with speculative bubbles is that you can be wrong for a long time before ultimately being proven right. This will likely prove to be especially the case when it comes to those who are bearish about Bitcoin ( BTC-USD ) and many other cryptocurrencies in general. I have argued for a while now that Bitcoin is destined to collapse. This is because it lacks any intrinsic value and is centered around hype and the premise of finding a bigger fool willing to pay more than you did. Recently, Bitcoin prices have been hitting all-time highs. This has been driven by increased adoption at the institutional level, for instance, with the growth of ETFs in the space. The Trump Administration also seems more open to cryptocurrency than previous administrations, which is also fueling the hype. In the short run, there''s no telling how high prices will go. Would I be surprised if they double, triple, or more? No, I wouldn''t. At the end of the day, I believe that it will drop, though. And I would also argue that there is mounting evidence that the underlying fundamentals are weakening. Because of this, I have no problem maintaining Bitcoin as a ‚Äòstrong sell‚Äô candidate. A Note on Speculative Bubbles I consider myself to be an avid reader of all things finance and economics. I am especially interested these days in the economic history of the Dutch Republic, but I digress. In recent years, one of the best financial books that I have read is Boom and Bust: A Global History of Financial Bubbles , which naturally talks about financial bubbles that have developed over the centuries. Some of these are bubbles that are household names. Others, like the British bicycle bubble, are unknown to the vast majority of society. In that book, the authors present the idea of the Bubble Triangle. Author Simply put, the Bubble Triangle represents the three elements needed in order for a speculative bubble to come into existence. These are marketability, money/credit, and speculation. Marketability refers to how easy it is to buy and sell the asset in question. Money and credit refer to how easy it is to access funds, whether because of government stimulus, broader societal wealth, or policies that make borrowing cheaper, which make it possible for the bubble to inflate. Speculation is the third and final element and refers to the idea that participants must believe that they can sell what they have purchased to somebody else at a higher price than what they paid for it. This could be a legitimate belief that the asset will appreciate based on intrinsic reasons. But often, it is rooted in the Greater Fool Theory. Even though these are the elements needed in order for a speculative bubble to come about, they almost always require fuel, or a catalyst if you will, in order to take off. Typically, this would be technology or changes in the political environment. I would argue that Bitcoin has experienced both, especially on the technology side. I firmly believe that blockchain technology is revolutionary and will play a big role in society in the long run. Bitcoin enthusiasts obviously believe that as well. Latching on to that, they have leveraged technology like easy trading around the clock, the benefits of blockchain offers, and more, to pump up Bitcoin. More recently, the political environment, at least in the US, has become more favorable to Bitcoin. In 2021, the Securities and Exchange Commission approved the first Bitcoin futures-based ETF. And in January of last year, they approved a Bitcoin spot ETF that granted investors the opportunity to buy into funds that actually held Bitcoin directly. Under the Trump Administration, the political environment has become even more favorable. In March of this year, Donald Trump signed an executive order establishing a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve that would be funded with Bitcoin seized by law enforcement. The Securities and Exchange Commission has dismissed enforcement actions against major companies such as Coinbase ( COIN ) and created a Crypto Task Force while simultaneously wiping out the National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team in an effort to soften criminal enforcement in this space. Most recently, Trump signed the GENIUS Act , which provided significant clarity for the use of stablecoins and will certainly further their adoption. In fact, at the time that developme

HEADLINE: Crypto finance company Matrixport Reveals Key Factor Supporting Bitcoin Bull Scenario! Here Are the Details
SUMMARY: Crypto finance company Matrixport, in its ‚ÄúChart of the Day‚Äù report, emphasized that one of the key factors supporting the Bitcoin (BTC) bull scenario for 2025 is the initial public offering (IPO) preparations of crypto companies. Matrixport: Bitcoin''s 2025 Bull Run Could Be Fueled by IPO Wave According to the report, Wall Street investment banks also want to create a favorable market environment for these IPOs by encouraging BTC prices to remain high. This expectation is no longer just a theory. Numerous crypto companies, including Circle, have filed for IPOs. Matrixport reports that a new crypto company is queuing up for IPO almost every week. This is increasing institutional interest and capital flow into the sector. Sharp Rises in Crypto Stocks The stock performance of crypto-focused companies listed on the stock exchange also supports this interest: MicroStrategy: 47% increase Coinbase: 67% increase Robinhood: 180% increase Circle: A stunning 597% rise These massive price increases reinforce investor confidence and increase IPO excitement and participation in the crypto sector. According to Matrixport, the IPO cycle by crypto firms could prolong the bull market by supporting Bitcoin prices to remain high. The interest in this wave from both traditional financial players and individual investors could keep BTC strong through 2025. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Crypto finance company Matrixport Reveals Key Factor Supporting Bitcoin Bull Scenario! Here Are the Details

HEADLINE: EU Gaming Company Fragbite Group Launches Bitcoin Treasury with 4.3 BTC Purchase
SUMMARY: Swedish gaming company Fragbite Group has launched a Bitcoin treasury strategy by purchasing 4.3 Bitcoin at an average price of $112,958 per coin, becoming the latest European firm to adopt cryptocurrency as a primary reserve asset amid a global wave of corporate adoption. The company raised an additional 6 million Swedish krona ($630,000) through an interest-free convertible loan to fund further Bitcoin purchases, with conversion rights triggered if shares exceed the SEK 13 conversion price by 30% for 20 consecutive trading days. Bitcoin Treasury Director Patrik von Bahr called the move positioning Fragbite as ‚Äú an early pioneer in a revolutionary industry .‚Äù First purchase complete 4.3 bitcoin at an average price of app. USD 112 958 / bitcoin marks the start of operations under the newly established Bitcoin Treasury https://t.co/bwPYv8e2SD $FRAG pic.twitter.com/o2vbP95vAK ‚Äî Fragbite Group (@FragbiteGroup) July 22, 2025 The acquisition occurs as corporate Bitcoin adoption accelerates globally, with over 274 companies now holding 3.57M Bitcoin on their balance sheets. Most recently, MicroStrategy added 6,220 Bitcoin for $739.8 million during the week ending July 20, bringing total holdings to 607,770 Bitcoin worth over $43 billion. The corporate treasury trend spans multiple sectors and geographies, with Japanese Metaplanet targeting 210,000 Bitcoin by 2027, London-listed companies announcing nine Bitcoin treasury plans in recent weeks , and European firms increasingly viewing cryptocurrency as an inflation hedge and a strategic asset. European Corporate Bitcoin Adoption Gains Momentum Fragbite Group joins a growing number of European companies embracing Bitcoin treasury strategies as regulatory clarity improves across the region. The gaming firm‚Äôs convertible loan structure offers flexibility, with no interest accruing until November 30, 2030, and includes forced conversion rights if the shares exceed 200% of the conversion price. Similarly, Swedish firm Refine Group also recently launched a $1 million Bitcoin treasury backed by fresh capital. In comparison, London markets have seen companies like Smarter Web Company surge from ¬£4 million to over ¬£1 billion market value following Bitcoin purchase announcements. The European adoption wave contrasts with established corporate treasury leaders, such as MicroStrategy, which continues to accumulate aggressively through at-the-market equity offerings. The company raised $740.3 million across four ATM programs to fund its latest purchase of 6,220 Bitcoins at an average price of $118,940. Moreover, Australian DigitalX secured $13.54 million from Animoca Brands , UTXO Management, and ParaFi Capital for expanding its Bitcoin treasury, bringing its total assets to $95 million. Market Dynamics Signal Rotation as ETF Flows Diverge Institutions are increasingly flocking to Bitcoin as a treasury, as evidenced by Bitcoin spot ETFs, which recorded their first net outflow in 12 days , with $131.35 million exiting on July 21. Bitcoin spot ETFs saw a $131.35M outflow on July 21, snapping a 12-day inflow streak, while Ethereum ETFs pulled in $297M as investor focus shifted. #SpotBitcoinETF #CryptoETF https://t.co/13rOyhITvN ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) July 22, 2025 This came after over two consecutive weeks of inflows, marking the end of a robust period that had attracted over $6.6 billion since early July. The natural outflow can be primarily attributed to Bitcoin experiencing a slight pullback after its recent $123K ATH peak. BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT reported zero net inflow despite holding $86.16 billion in assets, while Ark Invest‚Äôs ARKB and Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC saw outflows of $77.46 million and $36.75 million, respectively. However, Ethereum ETFs continued their momentum with $296.59 million in daily inflows, extending their winning streak to 12 consecutive days. BlackRock‚Äôs ETHA led with $101.98 million in new capital, while Fidelity‚Äôs FETH attracted $126.93 million, as combined Ethereum ETF assets reached $19.6 billion. Notably, SpaceX has recently sparked concern with its $152.85 million Bitcoin transaction after a three-year hiatus. The movement, as speculated, represents potential portfolio restructuring rather than liquidation. The aerospace company‚Äôs wallet transferred 1,308.45 Bitcoin, while maintaining 6,977 Bitcoin under Coinbase Prime custody, worth approximately $818.3 million. Historical data shows SpaceX received multiple Bitcoin inflows between 2021 and 2022, with holdings exceeding $1.6 billion during the previous bull run. Source: TradingView At the time of writing, Bitcoin is trading above $118,700 after consolidating from its all-time high of $123,000.The cryptocurrency is displaying bullish pennant patterns that typically signal continuation moves after a rally correction or pullback. The post EU Gaming Company Fragbite Group Launches Bitcoin Treasury with 4.3 BTC Purchase appeared first on Cryptonews .

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Takes Center Stage: Kitabo Unveils Bold $5.4M Treasury Strategy
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Takes Center Stage: Kitabo Unveils Bold $5.4M Treasury Strategy In a move that‚Äôs turning heads across both the traditional financial sector and the burgeoning cryptocurrency world, Kitabo Co., a venerable Japanese textile materials company, has announced its intention to purchase a substantial ¬•800 million (approximately $5.4 million) worth of Bitcoin . This isn‚Äôt just another transaction; it‚Äôs a strategic pivot, signaling a bold new direction for a company rooted in a centuries-old industry. Imagine a textile firm, known for its threads and fabrics, deciding to weave Bitcoin into the very fabric of its financial future. It‚Äôs a fascinating development that underscores the evolving perception of digital assets. What‚Äôs Driving This Bold Bitcoin Move by Kitabo? The announcement, initially shared by @btcNLNico on X, quickly sent ripples through the financial community. Kitabo Co., with its long-standing history in the Japanese textile sector, is stepping into the digital age in a significant way. Their decision to allocate a considerable portion of their treasury to Bitcoin isn‚Äôt arbitrary; it‚Äôs a calculated move rooted in a changing global economic landscape. Traditionally, corporate treasuries hold cash, short-term bonds, or other low-risk liquid assets. However, in an era marked by persistent inflation concerns, currency debasement, and ultra-low interest rates in many developed economies, these traditional assets often yield negative real returns. This erodes purchasing power over time. Companies are increasingly seeking alternative assets that can act as a hedge against inflation and offer potential for capital appreciation. For Kitabo, the decision to invest in Bitcoin likely stems from a multi-faceted analysis: Diversification: Spreading risk beyond traditional financial instruments. Inflation Hedge: Viewing Bitcoin as ‚Äòdigital gold‚Äô capable of preserving value against rising costs. Long-Term Growth Potential: Betting on Bitcoin‚Äôs continued adoption and price appreciation as a nascent asset class. Innovation & Forward-Thinking: Positioning the company as modern and adaptable to new financial paradigms. This isn‚Äôt just about holding a digital asset; it‚Äôs about a company, from a traditional industry, acknowledging the shifting tides of global finance and proactively positioning itself for future economic realities. Why Are Companies Embracing Bitcoin for Their Balance Sheets? Kitabo is certainly making headlines, but they are not the first. The trend of corporations adding Bitcoin to their balance sheets has been gaining momentum over the past few years, pioneered by companies like MicroStrategy and, famously for a period, Tesla. What makes Bitcoin an attractive, albeit unconventional, treasury asset for these diverse enterprises? Here are some compelling reasons that drive corporate Bitcoin adoption: A Hedge Against Inflation: With central banks globally engaging in quantitative easing and governments increasing spending, many fear a devaluation of fiat currencies. Bitcoin‚Äôs fixed supply cap of 21 million coins makes it inherently scarce, leading many to view it as a superior store of value compared to traditional currencies. Companies see it as a way to protect their capital from erosion. Digital Gold Narrative: Often dubbed ‚Äòdigital gold,‚Äô Bitcoin shares characteristics with the precious metal, such as scarcity and global acceptance. In times of economic uncertainty or geopolitical instability, investors and now corporations, look for safe-haven assets outside the traditional financial system. Diversification of Treasury Assets: Relying solely on cash or low-yielding bonds can be risky in a volatile economic climate. Adding Bitcoin introduces a new asset class with a low correlation to traditional markets, potentially reducing overall portfolio risk and enhancing returns. Potential for Significant Appreciation: Despite its volatility, Bitcoin has demonstrated remarkable long-term growth. Companies are willing to take on some short-term price fluctuations for the potential of substantial long-term gains, which could significantly boost their financial reserves. Attracting Talent and Investors: Being an early adopter or an innovative player in the crypto space can enhance a company‚Äôs brand image. It can signal to tech-savvy talent and investors that the company is forward-thinking and adaptable, potentially attracting new capital and human resources. Future-Proofing Business Models: As the world becomes increasingly digital, integrating cryptocurrencies might be seen as a necessary step for future business operations, whether for payments, supply chain management, or other blockchain-enabled functionalities. These factors collectively paint a picture of why companies, from software firms to textile manufacturers, are re-evaluating their treasury strategies and considering Bitcoin as a legitimate, if unconventional, asset. Navigating the Challenges: What Risks Does Holding Bitcoin Pres

HEADLINE: Bitcoin price prediction: ChatGPT, Google Gemini predict when BTC will hit $1M
SUMMARY: From ChatGPT to Google Gemini and Perplexity AI, these tools are helping experts estimate how far Bitcoin could climb in the longer term. Bitcoin price prediction has become an important subject within the community and for good reason. Investors, analysts and now even AI models are weighing in with bold forecasts and data-backed expectations. In the next section, we will review their insights and answer the question of when Bitcoin will hit $1 million. And after that, we will take a look at a new crypto coin, attracting global interest and creating a wave of its own. Bitcoin price prediction: when will BTC hit $1 million? At press time, Bitcoin has pulled back slightly to $118,000, but still commands a dominant 59.95% share of the market, totaling $2.37 trillion in market cap. Despite the pause, investor sentiment remains bullish and AI models are projecting the momentum from fresh ETF inflows to sustain its growth in the next 12‚Äì24 months. Analysts affirm that recent consolidation is a healthy one, as some traders and investors have trimmed profits following Bitcoin‚Äôs climb past 120K. According to them, recent inflows into spot Bitcoin ETFs now record six consecutive weeks of net additions surpassing $10 billion. A sign that confirms institutional interest hasn‚Äôt dwindled. Google Gemini‚Äôs model, trained on market momentum, projects that if inflows continue at this pace, Bitcoin price prediction will remain bullish in the long term and the asset could test $200K by early 2026. The model predicts a possible stretch target of $1 million by 2029, assuming diminishing sell pressure and macroeconomic conditions remain favourable. Meanwhile, OpenAI‚Äôs ChatGPT suggests a shorter timeline for the asset in Bitcoin price prediction, especially if it breaks past $130K in the coming weeks. In a high-demand scenario with sustained global adoption and regulatory clarity, BTC could sell above $1 million sometimes between 2027 and 2028. Remittix (RTX): exploring a trillion-dollar industry Remittix is a next-gen PayFi protocol focused on solving the biggest bottlenecks in cross-border payments such as: high fees, slow settlements and lack of direct crypto-to-fiat conversion tools. AI models like ChatGPT and Google Gemini are forecasting that RTX could rally up to 20√ó before year-end, rivaling even the best-performing Layer 1s. The reason? Its unique DeFi capabilities and mass market appeal. Both AI-models highlight the following as bullish indicators for the new crypto gem: Closes a trillion-dollar market gap. Backed by a working and audited infrastructure. Whale accumulation and continued market traction. PayFi API & merchant tools: Businesses can now accept crypto and receive instant local bank deposits. Multi-asset support: Remittix lets users convert BTC, ETH, XRP, SOL and 40+ cryptos directly into fiat, a major breakthrough for real crypto utility. Real-world relevance: For freelancers and remote workers, Remittix removes the need for expensive middlemen; now instant settlements will be feasible. What‚Äôs more is the wallet launch, which is set to happen this quarter and the ongoing $250,000 Remittix giveaway. HEADLINE: BNB Holdings Soar: Nano Labs‚Äô Astounding $90M Strategic Boost in Web 3.0
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld BNB Holdings Soar: Nano Labs‚Äô Astounding $90M Strategic Boost in Web 3.0 The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with significant developments, and a recent announcement from Nasdaq-listed Web 3.0 infrastructure provider, Nano Labs Ltd, has certainly captured attention. In a bold move that underscores growing institutional confidence in digital assets, Nano Labs has substantially increased its BNB holdings , transforming its strategic reserve with a massive injection of capital. What‚Äôs Behind Nano Labs‚Äô Astounding Increase in BNB Holdings ? Nano Labs Ltd, a prominent player in the Web 3.0 space, recently made waves with its announcement via a Globe Newswire press release: the company has boosted its BNB holdings to an impressive 120,000 tokens. This significant accumulation, valued at approximately $90 million, is not merely a speculative investment but a calculated component of its long-term strategic reserve plan. But what exactly does this entail for a company operating at the forefront of Web 3.0 innovation? This strategic move by Nano Labs reflects a growing trend among tech-forward companies to diversify their treasury assets beyond traditional fiat currencies. For Nano Labs, integrating a substantial amount of BNB into its reserves could serve multiple purposes: Balance Sheet Strength: Holding a liquid and widely recognized digital asset like BNB can enhance the company‚Äôs financial stability and liquidity, especially within the volatile yet opportunity-rich crypto ecosystem. Ecosystem Alignment: BNB is the native cryptocurrency of the Binance ecosystem, which includes the Binance Smart Chain (BSC), a vital platform for many Web 3.0 applications. Increasing BNB holdings might signal a deeper alignment or future integration with this expansive ecosystem. Strategic Flexibility: A substantial BNB reserve provides Nano Labs with greater flexibility for future investments, partnerships, or even operational expenses within the decentralized finance (DeFi) and Web 3.0 sectors. Inflation Hedge: In an era of economic uncertainty and rising inflation, digital assets are increasingly viewed as potential hedges against the devaluation of fiat currencies, offering a different kind of stability. This decision is a testament to Nano Labs‚Äô forward-thinking approach, positioning itself not just as a builder of Web 3.0 infrastructure but also as a significant participant in its underlying economy. Understanding the Power of BNB Holdings in the Web 3.0 Landscape To fully grasp the magnitude of Nano Labs‚Äô decision, it‚Äôs essential to understand BNB itself. BNB, originally launched as Binance Coin, is far more than just a cryptocurrency; it‚Äôs the foundational token of the Binance ecosystem, one of the largest and most influential in the blockchain world. Its utility extends across various facets, including: Transaction Fees: Used to pay for transaction fees on Binance Chain and Binance Smart Chain. Staking and Governance: Holders can stake BNB to secure the network and participate in governance decisions. Discounts: Offers discounts on trading fees on the Binance exchange. Launchpad Access: Provides access to token sales on the Binance Launchpad, a platform for new crypto projects. Ecosystem Growth: Fuels a vast array of decentralized applications (dApps), DeFi protocols, and NFTs built on the Binance Smart Chain. Nano Labs‚Äô significant accumulation of BNB isn‚Äôt just about holding a digital asset; it‚Äôs about embedding themselves deeper into an ecosystem that is central to the very infrastructure they are building. Their increased BNB holdings can be seen as a strategic bet on the continued growth and dominance of the Binance ecosystem within the broader Web 3.0 paradigm. What Are the Potential Benefits for Nano Labs and the Market from These Elevated BNB Holdings ? The implications of Nano Labs‚Äô move extend beyond its balance sheet, potentially sending positive signals throughout the cryptocurrency market and, specifically, the Web 3.0 sector. Let‚Äôs explore some key benefits: For Nano Labs: Enhanced Credibility: As a Nasdaq-listed entity, a public declaration of substantial BNB holdings lends significant credibility to digital assets as legitimate corporate treasury assets. This can inspire confidence among traditional investors who might be hesitant about crypto. Operational Synergies: With significant BNB reserves, Nano Labs might find it easier to engage in partnerships, joint ventures, or even acquisitions within the Binance ecosystem, fostering closer ties and operational efficiencies. Future-Proofing: By aligning with a robust and evolving blockchain ecosystem, Nano Labs is arguably future-proofing its operations and strategic direction in a rapidly digitizing world. For the Market and BNB: Increased Demand and Stability: A large-scale institutional purchase like this directly contributes to BNB‚Äôs demand, potentially influencing its price stability and overall market capitalization. Validation of Web 3.0 Ass

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Price Faces Critical Support: Can It Rise To $130K?
SUMMARY: The post Bitcoin Price Faces Critical Support: Can It Rise To $130K? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News After surging to a new all-time high of $123,231 on July 14th, the Bitcoin price has started to cool down due to exhaustion in strength. As of writing, it is consolidating around the $116,000 to $120,000 range, which has turned down to a zone that has become a battleground for short-term sentiment. Meanwhile, when writing, the bulls in intraday have pushed BTC 1.34% to trade at $119,018 with $74.46 billion 24-hour volume and $2.37 trillion market cap. Now, traders and analysts are intrigued for BTC‚Äôs next move and are watching closely to find out whether this is a healthy retest or the beginning of a deeper correction. Rising Exchange Reserves Hint at Selling Pressure A primary concern right now is the increase in Bitcoin exchange reserves , which have risen to their highest point since late June. Per CryptoQuant insights , this uptick often signals that traders are moving coins onto exchanges to sell. This signifies a short-term profit-taking phase. However, the data isn‚Äôt entirely bearish. Despite growing reserves, overall inflows remain low when compared to peak periods earlier in the year. This implies that although some selling is occurring, it hasn‚Äôt reached levels that typically precede larger market downturns. This clearly suggests that retailers are offloading, and giants are absorbing it. Institutional Flows and Long-Term Holders Stay Committed At the same time, long-term on-chain signals remain constructive with the ETF data mostly green in July, with a cumulative total net inflow of $54.62 billion. Meanwhile, Michael Saylor keeps on accumulating, and other firms are also buying it. These steady inflows highlight sustained interest from large capital allocators, even as retail traders are realizing their gains. Analyst Finds $116K‚Äì$116.4K Zone As Crucial Technically, the Bitcoin price has been mostly trading in a range near $116K to $120K range in the past couple of days, where $116K to $116.4 is seen as critical immediate support, identified by a CryptoQuant analyst. Also, the recent intraday rise in BTC was observed from the same level. If the momentum is building again and manages to flip range high of $120K, then in the short term $125 and $130K would be the near-term targets. But if consolidation in the current range continues, then immediate support needs to hold the momentum for the BTC price. On the other hand, if BTC breaks below $116K with volume, it opens the door for a steeper retracement, potentially to $112K or even $110K. Analysts suggest that the bullish thesis remains valid as long as this $110K level isn‚Äôt breached.

HEADLINE: Bitcoin ETFs See $131M Outflow After 12-Day Inflow Run
SUMMARY: ARK Invest‚Äôs ARKB led the withdrawals with $77.46 million, followed by Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC and Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC. Despite the dip, total net assets remain strong at $151.6 billion. Analysts see the move as strategic rebalancing rather than panic selling. Meanwhile, spot Ethereum ETFs continued gaining momentum by bringing in $296.59 million on Monday and extending their inflow streak to 12 days. Profit Taking Hits Bitcoin ETFs Spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) experienced a reversal on Monday after recording a net outflow of $131.35 million and breaking a 12-day streak. The largest withdrawal came from ARK Invest‚Äôs ARKB, which lost $77.46 million in a single day. Bitcoin ETF flow (Source: Farside Investors ) Grayscale‚Äôs GBTC followed with $36.75 million in outflows, while Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC posted a $12.75 million decrease. Bitwise‚Äôs BITB and VanEck‚Äôs HODL also reported modest outflows of $1.91 million and $2.48 million, respectively. BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT, which is the largest spot Bitcoin ETF by net assets at $86.16 billion, remained unchanged with no inflows or outflows. Despite Monday‚Äôs retreat, total cumulative inflows into spot Bitcoin ETFs are still strong at $54.62 billion, with combined net assets now totaling $151.60 billion. This represents 6.52% of Bitcoin‚Äôs overall market capitalization. According to Vincent Liu , chief investment officer at Kronos Research, the recent outflows are not indicative of panic but rather strategic profit-taking by institutions close to Bitcoin‚Äôs all-time highs. Liu explained that this movement was a ‚Äúnatural pause‚Äù after an aggressive rally and should be seen as an institutional rebalancing rather than fear-based selling. The pullback happened on the heels of record-breaking inflows earlier in July where Bitcoin ETFs saw back-to-back billion-dollar days on July 10 and 11. In contrast to Bitcoin‚Äôs brief outflow hiccup, spot Ether ETFs continued their strong upward momentum by bringing in an additional $296.59 million on Monday. Ethereum ETF flow (Source: Farside Investors ) This extended their inflow streak to 12 consecutive days, and raised cumulative net inflows to $7.78 billion. The surge in interest was particularly evident last week when Ethereum ETFs posted their highest single-day inflows since launch, with $726.74 million on Wednesday followed by $602.02 million on Thursday.

HEADLINE: Cathie Wood‚Äôs ARK Invest Shifts to Ethereum Treasury Bet with Tom Lee‚Äôs Bitmine
SUMMARY: Cathie Wood‚Äôs ARK Invest is shifting sharply toward Ethereum through a significant investment in Bitmine Immersion Technologies, the Ethereum treasury firm chaired by Fundstrat‚Äôs Tom Lee. The move, disclosed in ARK‚Äôs daily trading update on Monday, marks the first time Wood‚Äôs funds have purchased Bitmine shares since the firm announced its strategic shift from Bitcoin to Ethereum in late June. ARK‚Äôs Innovation ETF (ARKK), Next Generation Internet ETF (ARKW), and Fintech Innovation ETF (ARKF) sold 218,986 shares of Coinbase (COIN) worth around $90.5 million and 463,293 shares of gaming company Roblox (RBLX) worth $57.7 million to fund the pivot. Simultaneously, the three funds purchased 4.4 million shares of Bitmine, valued at approximately $174 million, representing 1.5% of each ETF‚Äôs portfolio. Betting on Bitmine‚Äôs Ethereum Pivot Bitmine Immersion Technologies has seen its stock surge over 3,000% to a record high of $135 on July 3 following its announcement to switch its treasury strategy from Bitcoin to Ether. Although the price has since corrected to around $39.57, the stock remains up over 400% since the start of 2025, attracting notable investors including billionaire Peter Thiel, who recently acquired a 9.1% stake. For ARK Invest, the move aligns with its thesis of backing ‚Äúdisruptive innovation,‚Äù as Bitmine‚Äôs Ethereum pivot positions it to potentially capitalize on the growing institutional and developer interest around Ethereum, staking, and tokenization. This purchase also comes as ARK‚Äôs funds adjust positions in other firms, shifting shares from Robinhood and Block Inc. toward Bitmine and select tech firms like AMD, DoorDash, and Airbnb. ARK Invest Funds Realign Crypto and Fintech Holdings The ARKK fund, with $6.8 billion in assets under management, remains heavily weighted toward Tesla (9.7%), while Coinbase and Roblox still sit as its second and third largest holdings. It also holds a 5% position in stablecoin issuer Circle . The ARKW fund, which manages $2 billion with a focus on shifting technologies, continues to hold Robinhood, Coinbase, and Tesla as its top three, alongside minor stakes in Meta, Shopify, and Amazon. Meanwhile, the $1.2 billion ARKF fintech-themed fund, which includes Robinhood, Coinbase, Circle, Block, eToro, and PayPal , is currently the only ARK Invest fund with indirect Ethereum exposure, holding a 1.15% position in the 3IQ Ether Staking ETF. The fund also sold 225,742 shares of the ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF (ARKB) on July 16, signaling ARK‚Äôs deeper pivot toward Ethereum while recalibrating its broader crypto strategy to align with evolving market dynamics. The post Cathie Wood‚Äôs ARK Invest Shifts to Ethereum Treasury Bet with Tom Lee‚Äôs Bitmine appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

HEADLINE: Ethereum ETF Hype Builds, But Bitcoin Solaris Genesis Event at $1 Offers More Accessible Wealth Potential
SUMMARY: The post Ethereum ETF Hype Builds, But Bitcoin Solaris Genesis Event at $1 Offers More Accessible Wealth Potential appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News It feels like every week brings a fresh wave of crypto headlines shouting about institutional money. This week‚Äôs star? Ethereum ETFs. Sure, it is exciting. Wall Street finally giving Ethereum its shiny badge of legitimacy is no small feat. But while institutional investors fight over who gets to stack ETH first, everyday users are asking a different question: where can I actually build wealth in crypto without needing a hedge fund behind me? The answer may surprise you. It is not Ethereum. It is Bitcoin Solaris (BTC-S) and its Genesis Event. Why Bitcoin Solaris Could Be the Smarter Play Let‚Äôs get this out of the way. Ethereum is still a powerhouse. Its smart contracts and DeFi reach are unmatched. But at its current valuation, ETH is not exactly offering that early-stage, life-changing potential anymore. Buying Ethereum now feels a bit like arriving late to a buffet; you still get food, but the best plates are gone. Bitcoin Solaris , however, is serving something fresh. BTC-S combines the familiarity of Bitcoin with the speed, scalability, and energy efficiency that Ethereum investors wish ETH had out of the box. This hybrid chain isn‚Äôt promising the moon without substance. It is already delivering on performance through its dual-consensus architecture and blazing-fast transaction speeds. The Core of BTC-S Power At its heart, Bitcoin Solaris is a technological beast designed for the modern age. Its hybrid consensus model merges Proof-of-Work for security and Delegated Proof-of-Stake for scalability and efficiency. This design enables Bitcoin Solaris to achieve up to 10,000 transactions per second with 2-second finality, leaving older chains gasping for air. Base Layer: Classic PoW for rock-solid security, compatible with existing Bitcoin mining rigs. Solaris Layer: DPoS for lightning-fast smart contract execution and validator rotation. Cross-layer synchronization ensures seamless integrity between layers. And it is all energy-efficient, consuming 99.95% less energy than Bitcoin mining. Think of it as Bitcoin‚Äôs smarter, younger sibling who learned from big brother‚Äôs mistakes. The upcoming Solaris Nova App will make this power available right from your pocket, transforming mobile devices into fully operational mining hubs. It is a bold step toward democratizing blockchain participation, where anyone can contribute and earn without expensive hardware. Presale Frenzy: Why Everyone Is Watching BTC-S Now Bitcoin Solaris is closing in on the finish line for its presale. Phase 13 is currently live with tokens priced at $13. The launch price is $20, meaning early adopters are eyeing a solid ROI. Presale runs for only 90 days and it is almost over. Only around 1 week remains until the curtain drops on what is already one of the most explosive and shortest presales in the space. Over $7.7M+ raised and 15,800+ unique users onboard reflect the momentum behind BTC-S. But here‚Äôs the twist. Bitcoin Solaris is introducing a Price Rollback for a very limited time through its Genesis Event, a promotional window where early participants can purchase BTC-S at $1 instead of $13. This is not just a price cut. It is a calculated strategy to reward believers before liftoff. The potential ROI here? A staggering 1900%. This rare opportunity underscores how serious BTC-S is about onboarding as many as possible ahead of its major launch. Opportunities like this do not come around often. Especially not with a project this technically sound. Why Wait Years for Gains When BTC-S Is Moving Now To receive your tokens on launch day, wallets like Trust Wallet and Metamask are recommended for seamless delivery. Audited. Trusted. Ready. Security is a non-negotiable in crypto. Bitcoin Solaris backs up its bold promises with third-party validation. Audits from Cyberscope and Freshcoins confirm the robustness of BTC-S smart contracts and protocols. The community is growing fast, with daily discussions happening on Telegram and X . These are not just numbers; they are real people sharing insights, strategies, and excitement about what Bitcoin Solaris is building. Why This Technology Matters for Real Wealth Building Bitcoin Solaris is not about gimmicks. It is about sustainable wealth creation through accessibility and performance. Mining is no longer confined to tech geeks with warehouses of GPUs. Thanks to the upcoming Solaris Nova App, anyone with a phone can mine BTC-S. This means broader adoption, stronger network security, and, yes, more earning potential. Key strengths fueling BTC-S wealth potential: Universal mining from smartphones, laptops, and rigs. Cross-chain integrations for rapid adoption. Rust-based smart contracts powering real DeFi applications. Fixed supply of 21 million tokens, scarcity driving long-term value. The tokenomics speak for themselves. BTC-S ensures fair distributi

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Data Center Unleashes Massive $20M Texas Expansion for Soluna
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Data Center Unleashes Massive $20M Texas Expansion for Soluna The world of digital finance is constantly evolving, with Bitcoin leading the charge as a decentralized store of value. But behind every transaction and every new block mined lies a complex, energy-intensive infrastructure. This is where companies like Soluna Holdings come into play, building the backbone of the digital economy. In a remarkable stride forward, Soluna has just secured a substantial $20 million investment from Spring Lane Capital, earmarked for a significant expansion of its Project Kati Bitcoin data center facility in Texas. This isn‚Äôt just about more mining rigs; it‚Äôs about scaling sustainable infrastructure and positioning for the future of both cryptocurrency and artificial intelligence. Soluna‚Äôs Vision: Powering the Future of Bitcoin Data Centers in Texas Soluna Holdings isn‚Äôt just another player in the Bitcoin mining space; they are pioneers in developing sustainable Bitcoin data center and AI-focused infrastructure. Their recent $20 million funding round, spearheaded by Spring Lane Capital, underscores a shared vision for efficient, environmentally conscious digital asset operations. This substantial capital injection is specifically allocated to accelerate the expansion of their Project Kati facility, a cornerstone of their operations situated strategically in Texas. The expansion is ambitious, targeting an additional 35 megawatts (MW) of capacity. To put that into perspective, 35 MW can power a small town, but for Soluna, it translates into the ability to host approximately 12,000 next-generation mining rigs. These aren‚Äôt your average home setups; these are state-of-the-art machines designed for maximum efficiency and computational power. The meticulous planning is evident in their timeline: construction is slated to commence in Q3 2025, with full operational status anticipated by Q1 2026. This phased approach allows for careful resource allocation and integration, ensuring a smooth transition to increased capacity. What makes this partnership particularly compelling is its longevity. Soluna‚Äôs collaboration with Spring Lane Capital is not new; it‚Äôs an ongoing relationship built on trust and a proven track record. This continued backing from a reputable investment firm specializing in sustainable infrastructure speaks volumes about Soluna‚Äôs operational integrity and long-term potential. It‚Äôs a testament to their commitment to building robust, future-proof Bitcoin data center solutions. Why Texas? The Strategic Advantage for Bitcoin Mining Operations The choice of Texas as the primary location for Soluna‚Äôs expanded Bitcoin data center operations is far from arbitrary; it‚Äôs a calculated strategic move. The Lone Star State has rapidly emerged as a global hub for large-scale Bitcoin mining, and for good reason. Its unique energy landscape offers a compelling blend of advantages that are hard to find elsewhere. Firstly, Texas boasts a deregulated energy market, which fosters competition among power providers. This often translates into more competitive electricity prices, a critical factor for energy-intensive operations like Bitcoin mining. Furthermore, Texas is a powerhouse in renewable energy, particularly wind and solar. This abundance of clean energy sources aligns perfectly with Soluna‚Äôs commitment to sustainable operations, allowing them to tap into greener power grids and potentially reduce their carbon footprint. This focus on renewable energy is increasingly important for companies aiming to meet environmental, social, and governance (ESG) criteria. Secondly, the state‚Äôs grid operator, ERCOT (Electric Reliability Council of Texas), has shown a willingness to work with large energy consumers, including Bitcoin miners, through programs like demand response. This means miners can agree to curtail their operations during peak demand times or when the grid is under stress, in exchange for incentives. This flexibility not only benefits the grid but can also provide cost savings for the mining facilities. It‚Äôs a symbiotic relationship that supports grid stability while enabling large-scale industrial operations. Finally, Texas has cultivated a generally welcoming regulatory environment for cryptocurrency businesses. While regulations are always evolving, the state has positioned itself as forward-thinking in its approach to blockchain and digital assets, attracting significant investment and innovation in the sector. This combination of affordable, abundant, and increasingly green energy, coupled with a supportive regulatory climate, makes Texas an undeniable magnet for advanced Bitcoin data center infrastructure development. Beyond Bitcoin: How Soluna‚Äôs Data Center Infrastructure Supports AI While Bitcoin mining remains a core component of Soluna‚Äôs business model, their strategic vision extends far beyond. The company is actively developing its facilities to serve as dual-purpose data centers, capable of

HEADLINE: BTC Long-Term Holders Realize High Profits: Is This a Market Top Signal?
SUMMARY: Following bitcoin hitting its current all-time high (ATH), long-term holders (LTHs) have been collecting profits. This comes as the cryptocurrency consolidates to cool off from the latest rally. The intensity of profit-taking from LTHs raises speculation that the market may have reached a peak for this cycle. However, Gaah, a pseudonymous analyst at the market intelligence platform CryptoQuant, believes the top is not yet in. LTHs Take Profits According to Gaah, the LTH Spent Output Profit Ratio (SOPR) has climbed to its highest level in 2025. The indicator has passed the mid-range, but remains below the red zone, which has marked cycle tops in past bull markets. The SOPR‚Äôs current level indicates that LTHs have increased their selling activities, taking more profit, but not at excessive levels. Gaah said the market usually sees such high levels during periods of euphoria and mass distribution. This further suggests that the market has not yet reached its peak, despite bitcoin‚Äôs rally past $123,000. Analyzing past data, market experts see macro top signals when the LTH SOPR rises to a level above 4.0. The metric is currently slightly above 2.5, supporting the belief that there is room for further price appreciation before the market reaches overheated levels. ‚ÄúThis behavior indicates a heated market, but still far from a final top. Investors should monitor the continuation of this trend as a sign of the cycle‚Äôs maturation, without ignoring the risks of significant corrections along the way,‚Äù Gaah added. Whale Inflows to Exchanges Rise Meanwhile, the surge in LTH profit-taking is evident in flows from Bitcoin whales to crypto exchanges. A previous report revealed that the monthly average of whale inflows has increased by approximately $17 billion, from $28 billion to $ 45 billion. The market witnessed this growth between July 14 and 18, around the time BTC touched $123,000 for the first time. The increase in flows to exchanges reflects the transfer of at least 80,000 BTC, as whales scramble to lock in profits. Analysts say Bitcoin‚Äôs outlook remains bullish, but with a slight fragility in the near term. This could be further exacerbated by continued profit-taking by whales, LTHs, and even retail investors. Fortunately, CryptoQuant also found a decline in daily whale inflows to exchanges, suggesting that selling pressure is easing. Regardless, BTC could either consolidate or face a deeper correction before its next leg up. HEADLINE: A Giant Electric Vehicle Manufacturer Listed on Nasdaq Raised Funds to Buy Bitcoin! Here Are the Details
SUMMARY: Nasdaq-listed electric vehicle manufacturer Volcon announced the successful completion of a private funding round with gross proceeds exceeding $500 million. Volcon Raises $500 Million for Bitcoin Treasury Strategy The company is officially launching a Bitcoin treasury strategy, using 95% of the proceeds. Volcon''s main partner in this strategic move is the leading cryptocurrency exchange Gemini. Volcon''s funding round attracted strong interest from prominent crypto venture capital firms and blockchain infrastructure providers, including FalconX, Pantera Capital, Borderless, and Relayer Capital. Members of the company''s board of directors and traditional financial institutions also participated in the investment process. ‚ÄúVolcon aims to offer investors the opportunity to invest in a reliable treasury strategy focused on Bitcoin through new listings that will be traded on different exchange platforms,‚Äù the company said in a statement. Volcon will rebrand as ‚ÄúEmpery Digital‚Äù in the coming weeks, operating under the ticker symbol ‚ÄúEMPD.‚Äù Its existing powersports vehicle division will be renamed ‚ÄúEmpery Mobility.‚Äù According to the company''s statement, net proceeds from the funding round have already been transferred to Gemini''s custody accounts. Volcon had also begun building its Bitcoin treasury by purchasing 280.14 BTC prior to this announcement. Volcon''s move highlights the growing popularity of Bitcoin as a reserve asset strategy among institutional firms. As of July 21st, the total holdings of Bitcoin treasury firms excluding Tesla, Coinbase, and Block reached a peak of 745,580 BTC. Michael Saylor''s Strategy firm holds the largest share of this holding, with 601,550 BTC. Volcon shares closed down 2.16% at $16.74 on Monday but have risen more than 116% over the past five days. This volatility reflects investor interest and market expectations for the company''s Bitcoin strategy. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: A Giant Electric Vehicle Manufacturer Listed on Nasdaq Raised Funds to Buy Bitcoin! Here Are the Details
